    react-md-data-table-fixed-headers-footers

    @mixin react-md-data-table-fixed-headers-footers() { ... }

    Description

    Creates the styles for fixed headers and footers in a data table.

    Parameters

    None.

    Requires

    • [variable] md-data-table-fixed-wrapper-min-width
    • [variable] md-data-table-header-height
    • [variable] md-data-table-column-height
    • [variable] md-data-table-header-height
    • [variable] md-data-table-column-height

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-data-tables

    react-md-make-fixed-table

    @mixin react-md-make-fixed-table($height, $header-height: $md-data-table-header-height, $footer-height: $md-data-table-column-height, $toolbar-height: null) { ... }

    Description

    This is a utility function for making a fixed table via css instead of inline styles. This one is a bit more reliable since you can provide the cell heights correctly.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $height

    The height to use for the fixed table. If this value is a boolean, the height will be calculated from the view height.

    		Number or Boolean— none
    $header-height

    The height for the table's header. If this is null, this table should not have a fixed header.

    		Number$md-data-table-header-height
    $footer-height

    The height for the table's footer. If this is null, the table should not have a fixed footer.

    		Number$md-data-table-column-height
    $toolbar-height

    An optinal height of the toolbar to exclude when making the max-height of the table.

    		Numbernull

    Example

    Example Usage

    .fixed-table--200-300 {
  @include react-md-make-fixed-table(300px);

  width: 200px;
}

.fixed-table__footless--200-300 {
  @include react-md-make-fixed-table(300px, $md-data-table-header-height, null);
}

.fixed-table--viewport {
  @include react-md-make-fixed-table(true);
}

    Example Usage CSS Output

    .fixed-table--200-300 {
  width: 200px;
}

.fixed-table--200-300 .md-data-table__scroll-wrapper {
  max-height: 196px;
}

.fixed-table__footless--200-300 .md-data-table__scroll-wrapper {
  max-height: 244px;
}

.fixed-table--viewport .md-data-table__scroll-wrapper {
  max-height: calc(100vh - 104px);
}

    Requires

    • [variable] md-data-table-fixed-include-headers
    • [variable] md-data-table-fixed-include-footers
    • [variable] md-data-table-fixed-include-headers
    • [variable] md-data-table-fixed-include-footers

    react-md-data-table-card-headers

    @mixin react-md-data-table-card-headers($secondary-color: $md-secondary-color) { ... }

    Description

    Creates the styles for the TableCardHeader component only. The contextual header will have a background color of the secondary color's 50 swatch.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $secondary-color

    The secondary color to theme the contextual header's background color with.

    		Color$md-secondary-color

    Requires

    • [function] get-swatch
    • [placeholder] md-transition--decceleration
    • [placeholder] md-transition--acceleration
    • [variable] md-data-table-card-header-height
    • [variable] md-default-padding
    • [variable] md-dialog-btn-padding
    • [variable] md-data-table-card-header-z-index
    • [variable] md-data-table-card-header-font-size
    • [variable] md-font-medium
    • [variable] md-data-table-card-header-height
    • [variable] md-transition-time
    • [variable] md-transition-time

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-data-tables

    data-tables, themes

    variables

    md-data-table-contextual-fallback-color

    $md-data-table-contextual-fallback-color: null !default;

    Description

    A fallback color to use for the contextual table card header. This is only required when the $md-primary-color is not a valid material design color.

    Type

    Color

    See

    • [function] get-swatch

    mixins

    react-md-theme-data-tables

    @mixin react-md-theme-data-tables($secondary-color: $md-secondary-color, $light-theme: $md-light-theme, $include-table-card-headers: $md-data-table-include-table-card-headers, $context-ual-fallback-color: $md-data-table-contextual-fallback-color) { ... }

    Description

    Updates the styles for data tables only if the $light-theme does not equal the $md-light-theme. The only styles realy updated are the border colors and the hover/selected row background colors.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $secondary-color

    The secondary color to theme with.

    		Color$md-secondary-color
    $light-theme

    Boolean if updating the styles for the light theme.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme
    $include-table-card-headers

    Boolean if the contextual table card header styles should be included.

    		Boolean$md-data-table-include-table-card-headers
    $context-ual-fallback-color

    A fallback color to use for the contextual headers.

    		Color$md-data-table-contextual-fallback-color

    Requires

    • [function] get-color
    • [function] get-swatch
    • [function] get-swatch
    • [variable] md-light-theme
    • [variable] md-data-table-selected-color
    • [variable] md-data-table-dark-theme-selected-color
    • [variable] md-data-table-hover-color
    • [variable] md-data-table-dark-theme-hover-color
    • [variable] md-secondary-color
    • [variable] md-secondary-color

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-everything
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-everything

    react-md-dialogs-footer

    @mixin react-md-dialogs-footer() { ... }

    Description

    This includes the styles for the footer in dialogs. It also creates an additional button class name for buttons in dialogs. This is generally used in the md-react-md-dialogs mixin.

    Parameters

    None.

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-dialogs-footer;

    Requires

    • [variable] md-dialog-btn-padding
    • [variable] md-dialog-btn-padding

    • [variable] md-dialog-btn-padding

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-dialogs

    react-md-dialog-width

    @mixin react-md-dialog-width($units: 5) { ... }

    Description

    A simple mixin to set the width for a dialog.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $units

    The number of units for the dialog's width to be. this will be multiplied by 56px since it is a single unit on a dialog.

    		Number5

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    .md-dialog--big {
   @include react-md-dialog-width(10);
}

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-dialogs

    Description

    Type

    mixins

    react-md-dividers

    @mixin react-md-dividers($light-theme: $md-light-theme) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the Divider styles

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $light-theme

    Boolean if using the light theme.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-dividers;

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-divider-borders
    • [function] get-color
    • [variable] md-divider-height
    • [variable] md-divider-height
    • [variable] md-list-left-padding

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-everything

    react-md-divider-borders

    @mixin react-md-divider-borders($light-theme: $md-light-theme) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles and class names for creating a divider through the border property. This will create the following class names:

    • md-divider-border
      • the base class that applies the color and border style.
    • md-divider-border--top
      • only includes a border above the element.
    • md-divider-border--right
      • only includes a border to the right of the element.
    • md-divider-border--bottom
      • only includes a border below the element.
    • md-divider-border--left
      • only includes a border to the left of the element.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $light-theme

    Boolean if the borders should be styled for the light theme.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-divider-borders;

    Requires

    • [function] get-color

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-dividers

    See

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-divider-borders

    dividers, themes

    mixins

    $md-expansion-panel-secondary-font-size: 12px !default;

    Description

    Type

    Used by

    md-expansion-panel-padding

    $md-expansion-panel-padding: 24px !default;

    Description

    The default left/right padding for an expansion panel.

    Type

    String

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-expansion-panels
    • [mixin] react-md-expansion-panels
    • [mixin] react-md-expansion-panels

    md-expansion-panel-expanded-height

    expansion-panels, themes

    grids

    variables

    md-grid-phone-columns

    $md-grid-phone-columns: 4 !default;

    Description

    The number of columns to use for mobile devices. This should probably not be changed.

    Type

    Number

    md-grid-phone-margin

    $md-grid-phone-margin: 16px !default;

    Description

    The margin to use for grids on mobile devices. This should be one of the values in $md-grid-available-margins-and-gutters.

    Type

    Number

    See

    • [variable] md-grid-available-margins-and-gutters

    md-grid-phone-gutter

    $md-grid-phone-gutter: 16px !default;

    Description

    The gutter to use for grids on mobile devices. This should be one of the values in $md-grid-available-margins-and-gutters.

    Type

    Number

    See

    • [variable] md-grid-available-margins-and-gutters

    md-grid-tablet-breakpoint

    $md-grid-tablet-breakpoint: 600px !default;

    Description

    The breakpoint to use for modifying the grid for tablet devices.

    Type

    md-grid-tablet-columns

    Description

    The number of columns to use for tablet devices. This should probably not be changed.

    Type

    Number

    md-grid-tablet-margin

    $md-grid-tablet-margin: $md-grid-phone-gutter !default;

    Description

    The margin to use for grids on tablet devices. This should be one of the values in $md-grid-available-margins-and-gutters.

    Type

    Number

    See

    • [variable] md-grid-available-margins-and-gutters

    Type

    placeholders

    md-cell--right

    %md-cell--right { ... }

    Description

    A simple utility placeholder for positioning a cell to the right.

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-cards
    • [mixin] react-md-grid
    • [mixin] react-md-grid
    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-divider

    mixins

    react-md-grid

    @mixin react-md-grid($include-media: $md-media-included) { ... }

    Description

    Creates the styles for grids in material design. This basically creates a main flex container .md-grid that will style cells with appropriate margins and widths.

    The following classes will be created:

    • .md-grid - The main flex container. You should use this along with the .md-cell to get the correct gutter and margins for a material desing page.
    • .md-grid--no-spacing - An optional class name to use with the .md-grid. When they are used together, all the margins and spacings will be removed from the grid.
    • .md-cell - The main container for a column or cell in the grid. If this is used alone, the default behavior is to display 1 cell per row on mobile devices, 2 cells per row on tablets, and 3 cells per row on desktop / larger screens. For more fine tuning, it can be used along with one of the following.
    • .md-cell--right - This simply applies margin-left: auto to a cell. This is basically the same as applying float: right in a row.
    • .md-cell--top - This aligns the cell to the top of a row.
    • .md-cell--middle - This aligns the cell to the middle of a row.
    • .md-cell--bottom - This aligns the cell to the bottom of a row.
    • .md-cell--stretch - This aligns the cell to stretch the entire height of a row. This is the default behavior.
    • .md-cell--NUMBER - This is will allow a cell to span this many columns on all media sizes. When the NUMBER is greater than the number of columns allowed for a media device, it will span the entire row. This basically means that if you are using the base configuration options and following the material design specs, mobile devices only allow 4 columns per row, tablets 8 per row, and desktops 12. So specifying .md-cell .md-cell--6 would span an entire row on mobile devices, 3/4 of a row on tablets, and 1/2 of a row on desktops.
    • .md-cell--NUMBER-offset - This will offset the cell by the given number of columns. If the number is greater than the maximum amount of columsn allowed for the device's screen size, an entire row will be blank.
    • .md-cell--NUMBER-phone - This will set the cell's size only for mobile devices.
    • .md-cell--NUMBER-tablet - This will set the cell's size only for tablet devices.
    • .md-cell--NUMBER-desktop - This will set the cell's size only for desktop / large screens.
    • .md-cell--NUMBER-phone-offset - This will offset the cell's position only for mobile devices.
    • .md-cell--NUMBER-tablet-offset - This will offset the cell's position for tablet devices.
    • .md-cell--NUMBER-desktop-offset - This will offset the cell's position for desktop / large screens.
    • .md-cell--phone-hidden - This will hide a cell only for mobile devices.
    • .md-cell--tablet-hidden - This will hide a cell only for tablet devices.
    • .md-cell--desktop-hidden - This will hide a cell only for desktop / large screens.
    • .md-cell--order-NUMBER - This is an optional class name you can apply if you want this item to appear in a different order on the grid.
    • .md-cell--order-NUMBER-phone - This will set the cell's order only for mobile devices.
    • .md-cell--order-NUMBER-tablet - This will set the cell's order only for tablet devices.
    • .md-cell--order-NUMBER-desktop - This will set the cell's order only for desktop / large screens.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $include-media

    Boolean if the media queries should be included as well. If this is false, you will manually need to call the media mixins to get any useful grid.

    		Boolean$md-media-included

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-grid;

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-grid-media
    • [placeholder] md-cell--right
    • [placeholder] md-cell--right

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-everything

    react-md-make-custom-grid

    @mixin react-md-make-custom-grid($suffix, $margin, $gutter, $phone-columns: $md-grid-phone-columns, $tablet-columns: $md-grid-tablet-columns, $desktop-columns: $md-grid-desktop-columns) { ... }

    Description

    This creates another custom grid with a suffix. This is really only useful if you will have different grid layouts in your application depending on the page.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $suffix

    The suffix to apply to the end of .md-grid--.

    		String— none
    $margin

    The margin to use. This must be unitful number.

    		Number— none
    $gutter

    The gutter to use. This must be unitful number.

    		Number— none
    $phone-columns

    The number of columns to use on mobile devices. If this value is less than or equal to 0, the phone media query will not be created.

    		Number$md-grid-phone-columns
    $tablet-columns

    The number of columns to use on mobile devices. If this value is less than or equal to 0, the tablet media query will not be created.

    		Number$md-grid-tablet-columns
    $desktop-columns

    The number of columns to use on mobile devices. If this value is less than or equal to 0, the desktop media query will not be created.

    		Number$md-grid-desktop-columns

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-custum-grid('24-40', 24px, 40px);

    Example Usage CSS Output

    .md-grid--24-40 {
  ... styles ...
}

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-make-grid
    • [mixin] react-md-make-grid
    • [mixin] react-md-make-grid
    • [variable] md-grid-tablet-breakpoint
    • [variable] md-grid-tablet-breakpoint
    • [variable] md-grid-desktop-breakpoint
    • [variable] md-grid-desktop-breakpoint

    react-md-make-grid

    @mixin react-md-make-grid($media-type, $columns, $margin, $gutter, $suffix: null) { ... }

    Description

    Creates the grid with the given params.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $media-type

    The media type to create additional overrides for.

    		String— none
    $columns

    The number of columns for this media type to create.

    		Number— none
    $margin

    The margin to use for this media type.

    		Number— none
    $gutter

    The gutter to use for this media type.

    		Number— none
    $suffix

    An optional suffix to apply to the .md-grid. This is really only used when using the react-md-make-custom-grid mixin.

    		Stringnull

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-make-grid('phone', $md-grid-phone-columns, $md-grid-phone-margin, $md-grid-phone-gutter);

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-make-cells
    • [mixin] react-md-make-cells
    • [variable] md-grid-available-margins-and-gutters
    • [variable] md-grid-available-margins-and-gutters
    • [variable] md-grid-available-margins-and-gutters
    • [variable] md-grid-available-margins-and-gutters

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-make-custom-grid
    • [mixin] react-md-make-custom-grid
    • [mixin] react-md-make-custom-grid
    • [mixin] react-md-grid-mobile
    • [mixin] react-md-grid-tablet
    • [mixin] react-md-grid-desktop

    See

    • [mixin] react-md-make-custom-grid

    react-md-make-cells

    @mixin react-md-make-cells($columns, $margin, $gutter, $media-type) { ... }

    Description

    Creates the cells in a grid. This should normally only be used within the react-md-make-grid mixin.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $columns

    The number of columns for the given media type.

    		Number— none
    $margin

    The margin to use for the given media type.

    		Number— none
    $gutter

    The gutter to use for the given media type.

    		Number— none
    $media-type

    The current media type.

    		String— none

    Requires

    • [variable] md-grid-default-columns
    • [variable] md-grid-max-columns
    • [variable] md-grid-max-columns

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-make-grid
    • [mixin] react-md-make-grid

    See

    • [mixin] react-md-make-grid

    grids, media-queries

    mixins

    react-md-grid-mobile

    @mixin react-md-grid-mobile($columns: $md-grid-phone-columns, $margin: $md-grid-phone-margin, $gutter: $md-grid-phone-gutter) { ... }

    Description

    Creates a grid for mobile devices. This should normally be used in a media query or the react-md-grid-media mixin.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $columns

    The number of columns to use.

    		Number$md-grid-phone-columns
    $margin

    The margin to use.

    		Number$md-grid-phone-margin
    $gutter

    The gutter to use.

    		Number$md-grid-phone-gutter

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @media (max-width: $md-grid-tablet-breakpoint - 1) {
  @include react-md-grid-mobile;
}

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-make-grid

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-grid-media

    react-md-grid-tablet

    		Number$md-grid-tablet-columns

    		Number$md-grid-tablet-margin
    $gutter

    		Number$md-grid-tablet-gutter

    md-font-icon-include-separators

    $md-font-icon-include-separators: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the icon separator styles should be included by default.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-font-icon-include-dense

    $md-font-icon-include-dense: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the dense spec for icons should be included. This will update the size for icons to be smaller on desktop displays.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-font-icon-separator-padding

    $md-font-icon-separator-padding: $md-default-padding !default;

    Description

    The amount of padding to put between an icon and any text.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-icon-separators

    md-font-icon-light-theme-disabled-color

    md-font-icon-dark-theme-disabled-color

    $md-font-icon-dark-theme-disabled-color: rgba($md-white-base, .3) !default;

    Description

    Type

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-icons
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-icons

    mixins

    react-md-icons

    @mixin react-md-icons($light-theme: $md-light-theme, $include-media: $md-media-included, $include-separators: $md-font-icon-include-separators, $include-dense: $md-font-icon-include-dense) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the css for using md-icon.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $light-theme

    Boolean if the application is using the light-theme or not.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme
    $include-media

    Boolean if the media queries for icons should also be included. This also relies on the include-dense param.

    		Boolean$md-media-included
    $include-separators

    Boolean if the styles for separating content and an icon should be included.

    		Boolean$md-font-icon-include-separators
    $include-dense

    Boolean if the dense spec for icons should be included.

    		Boolean$md-font-icon-include-dense

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-icon-separators
    • [mixin] react-md-icons-media
    • [variable] md-light-theme-secondary-text-color
    • [variable] md-dark-theme-secondary-text-color
    • [variable] md-font-icon-size
    • [variable] md-transition-time
    • [variable] md-font-icon-light-theme-disabled-color
    • [variable] md-font-icon-dark-theme-disabled-color

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-everything

    react-md-icons-dense

    @mixin react-md-icons-dense() { ... }

    Description

    Updates the styles for an icon to use the dense font size. This should really only be used within a media query.

    Parameters

    None.

    Requires

    • [variable] md-font-icon-dense-size

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-icons-media

    react-md-icon-separators

    @mixin react-md-icon-separators() { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for the IconSeparator component.

    Parameters

    None.

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-icon-separators;

    Requires

    • [variable] md-font-icon-separator-padding
    • [variable] md-font-icon-separator-padding

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-icons

    icons, themes

    react-md-theme-icons

    @mixin react-md-theme-icons($light-theme: $md-light-theme) { ... }

    Description

    Updates the color of the base md-icon if the $light-theme paramater does not equal the global $md-light-theme.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $light-theme

    Boolean if using the light theme.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme

    inks

    variables

    md-ink-enter-transition-time

    $md-ink-enter-transition-time: .45s !default;

    Description

    The transition time for an ink to fully appear.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-inks

    md-ink-leave-transition-time

    $md-ink-leave-transition-time: .3s !default;

    Description

    The transition time for an ink to fully disappear.

    Type

    Number

    md-ink-pulse-time

    $md-ink-pulse-time: 1.5s !default;

    Description

    The animation time for the ink's pulsing.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-inks

    md-ink-expanded-scale

    $md-ink-expanded-scale: 1 !default;

    Description

    This is the scale that an ink should take once it has been fully created. It gets applied into scale.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-inks
    • [mixin] react-md-inks
    • [mixin] react-md-inks

    $md-ink-border-radius: 50% !default;

    Type

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-inks

    inks, themes

    mixins

    react-md-theme-inks

    @mixin react-md-theme-inks($light-theme: $md-light-theme) { ... }

    Description

    Themes the ink color for the given theme ONLY if the $light-theme does not equal the $md-light-theme.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $light-theme

    Boolean if stylign to the light theme.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-theme-inks(!$md-light-theme);

    Requires

    • [function] get-color
    • [variable] md-light-theme

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-everything
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-everything

    layovers

    variables

    md-layover-transition-time

    $md-layover-transition-time: .2s !default;

    Description

    The transition time for a layover's child to appear or disappear.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-layovers
    • [mixin] react-md-layovers

    md-layover-child-positions

    $md-layover-child-positions: (
  tl: '0 0',
  tr: '100% 0',
  bl: '0 100%',
  br: '100% 100%',
  below: '50% 0',
) !default;

    Description

    A Map of the available child positions for a layover. It is a mapping of the suffix to apply and a transform-origin to apply when animating.

    Type

    Map

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-layovers

    Type

    Type

    $md-list-include-controls: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the styles for lists with controls should be included.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-list-include-inline

    $md-list-include-inline: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if inline lists should be included. This will display a list horizontally instead of vertically.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-list-include-unstyled-class-name

    $md-list-include-unstyled-class-name: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the .md-list-unstyled should be included by default.

    Type

    Boolean

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-lists

    md-list-left-padding

    $md-list-left-padding: 72px !default;

    Description

    This is really the keyline to use for lists. When a list item is inset, this will be applied to the tile.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-dividers

    Type

    Description

    The amount of padding to apply to a list. This value will take precidence over the mobile and desktop variables so that this padding will be applied on all devices instead of switching based on media queries.

    Type

    placeholders

    md-list-unstyled

    %md-list-unstyled { ... }

    Description

    A placeholder for removing the default margin, padding and list styles

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-expansion-panels
    • [mixin] react-md-lists
    • [mixin] react-md-lists
    • [mixin] react-md-tabs

    mixins

    react-md-lists

    @mixin react-md-lists($light-theme: $md-light-theme, $nested-items-depth: $md-list-nested-items-depth, $nested-items-increment: $md-list-nested-items-increment, $include-media: $md-media-included, $include-icon: $md-list-include-icon, $include-avatar: $md-list-include-avatar, $include-two-lines: $md-list-include-two-lines, $include-three-lines: $md-list-include-three-lines, $include-controls: $md-list-include-controls, $include-unstyled: $md-list-include-unstyled-class-name, $include-inline: $md-list-include-inline, $include-dense-icons: $md-font-icon-include-dense) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for lists.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $light-theme

    Boolean if the lists should be styled for the light theme.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme
    $nested-items-depth

    The maximum depth for nested items.

    		Number$md-list-nested-items-depth
    $nested-items-increment

    The amount the nested item's padding should be incremented by.

    		Number$md-list-nested-items-increment
    $include-media

    Boolean if the media queries should be included.

    		Boolean$md-media-included
    $include-icon

    Boolean if the styles for lists with icons should be included.

    		Boolean$md-list-include-icon
    $include-avatar

    Boolean if the styles for lists with avatars should be included.

    		Boolean$md-list-include-avatar
    $include-two-lines

    Boolean if the styles for lists with two lines of text should be included.

    		Boolean$md-list-include-two-lines
    $include-three-lines

    Boolean if the styles for lists with three lines of text should be included.

    		Boolean$md-list-include-three-lines
    $include-controls

    Boolean if the styles for lists with controls to be included.

    		Boolean$md-list-include-controls
    $include-unstyled

    Boolean if the .md-list-unstyled class name should also be generated.

    		Boolean$md-list-include-unstyled-class-name
    $include-inline

    Boolean if inline lists should also be created.

    		Boolean$md-list-include-inline
    $include-dense-icons

    Boolean if the dense styles for icons should be included.

    		Boolean$md-font-icon-include-dense

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-lists;

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-lists-nested
    • [mixin] react-md-lists-media
    • [function] get-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [placeholder] md-list-unstyled
    • [placeholder] md-list-unstyled
    • [variable] md-list-padding
    • [variable] md-list-padding
    • [variable] md-list-padding
    • [variable] md-list-divider-margin
    • [variable] md-list-divider-margin
    • [variable] md-default-padding
    • [variable] md-default-padding
    • [variable] md-transition-time
    • [variable] md-list-height
    • [variable] md-list-height
    • [variable] md-list-left-padding
    • [variable] md-list-left-padding
    • [variable] md-font-icon-size
    • [variable] md-default-padding
    • [variable] md-list-left-padding
    • [variable] md-avatar-size
    • [variable] md-default-padding
    • [variable] md-default-padding
    • [variable] md-font-icon-size
    • [variable] md-avatar-size
    • [variable] md-list-primary-font-size
    • [variable] md-list-primary-font-size
    • [variable] md-list-secondary-font-size
    • [variable] md-list-primary-font-size
    • [variable] md-list-primary-font-size
    • [variable] md-list-primary-font-size
    • [variable] md-list-secondary-font-size
    • [variable] md-list-primary-font-size
    • [variable] md-list-avatar-height
    • [variable] md-list-avatar-height
    • [variable] md-list-secondary-font-size
    • [variable] md-list-primary-font-size
    • [variable] md-list-secondary-font-size
    • [variable] md-list-secondary-font-size
    • [variable] md-list-two-lines-height
    • [variable] md-list-two-lines-height
    • [variable] md-list-three-lines-height
    • [variable] md-list-three-lines-height
    • [variable] md-line-height
    • [variable] md-list-secondary-font-size
    • [variable] md-list-left-padding
    • [variable] md-font-icon-size
    • [variable] md-list-inline-padding

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-everything

    react-md-lists-nested

    @mixin react-md-lists-nested($nested-items-depth: $md-list-nested-items-depth, $nested-items-increment: $md-list-nested-items-increment) { ... }

    Description

    Creates the styles for nested lists. It basically loops over the $nested-items-depth param and adds padding-left to each nested list equal to the $md-list-left-padding * (1 + $depth * $nested-items-increment).

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $nested-items-depth

    The maximum depth for nested lists.

    		Number$md-list-nested-items-depth
    $nested-items-increment

    The amount that the nested list's padding should be incremented at each step.

    		Number$md-list-nested-items-increment

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-lists-nested;

    Requires

    • [variable] md-list-left-padding

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-lists

    lists, media-queries

    mixins

    react-md-lists-mobile

    @mixin react-md-lists-mobile($include-icon: $md-list-include-icon, $include-avatar: $md-list-include-avatar, $include-two-lines: $md-list-include-two-lines, $include-three-lines: $md-list-include-three-lines) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for lists on mobile devices. This should normally be used within a media query.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $include-icon

    Boolean if the styles for lists with icons should be included.

    		Boolean$md-list-include-icon
    $include-avatar

    Boolean if the styles for lists with avatars should be included.

    		Boolean$md-list-include-avatar
    $include-two-lines

    Boolean if the styles for lists with two lines of text should be included.

    		Boolean$md-list-include-two-lines
    $include-three-lines

    Boolean if the styles for lists with three lines of text should be included.

    		Boolean$md-list-include-three-lines

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @media #{$md-mobile-media} {
  @include react-md-lists-moble;
}

    Requires

    • [variable] md-list-padding
    • [variable] md-list-mobile-padding
    • [variable] md-list-mobile-padding
    • [variable] md-list-height
    • [variable] md-list-mobile-height
    • [variable] md-list-primary-font-size
    • [variable] md-list-mobile-primary-font-size
    • [variable] md-list-secondary-font-size
    • [variable] md-list-mobile-secondary-font-size
    • [variable] md-list-avatar-height
    • [variable] md-list-mobile-avatar-height
    • [variable] md-list-two-lines-height
    • [variable] md-list-mobile-two-lines-height
    • [variable] md-list-three-lines-height
    • [variable] md-list-mobile-three-lines-height
    • [variable] md-line-height
    • [variable] md-list-mobile-secondary-font-size
    • [variable] md-list-mobile-three-lines-addon-margin-top

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-lists-media

    react-md-lists-desktop

    @mixin react-md-lists-desktop($include-icon: $md-list-include-icon, $include-avatar: $md-list-include-avatar, $include-two-lines: $md-list-include-two-lines, $include-three-lines: $md-list-include-three-lines, $include-dense-icons: $md-font-icon-include-dense) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for lists on desktop screens. This should normally be used within a media query.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $include-icon

    Boolean if the styles for lists with icons should be included.

    		Boolean$md-list-include-icon
    $include-avatar

    Boolean if the styles for lists with avatars should be included.

    		Boolean$md-list-include-avatar
    $include-two-lines

    Boolean if the styles for lists with two lines of text should be included.

    		Boolean$md-list-include-two-lines
    $include-three-lines

    Boolean if the styles for lists with three lines of text should be included.

    		Boolean$md-list-include-three-lines
    $include-dense-icons

    Boolean if the dense styles for icons should be included.

    		Boolean$md-font-icon-include-dense

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @media #{$md-desktop-media} {
  @include react-md-lists-moble;
}

    Requires

    • [variable] md-list-padding
    • [variable] md-list-desktop-padding
    • [variable] md-list-desktop-padding
    • [variable] md-list-height
    • [variable] md-list-desktop-height
    • [variable] md-list-desktop-font-size
    • [variable] md-list-primary-font-size
    • [variable] md-list-secondary-font-size
    • [variable] md-list-avatar-height
    • [variable] md-list-desktop-avatar-height
    • [variable] md-list-two-lines-height
    • [variable] md-list-desktop-two-lines-height
    • [variable] md-list-three-lines-height
    • [variable] md-list-desktop-three-lines-height
    • [variable] md-line-height
    • [variable] md-list-desktop-font-size
    • [variable] md-list-desktop-three-lines-addon-margin-top
    • [variable] md-font-icon-dense-size
    • [variable] md-list-left-padding
    • [variable] md-font-icon-dense-size
    • [variable] md-default-padding

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-lists-media

    react-md-lists-media

    @mixin react-md-lists-media($include-icon: $md-list-include-icon, $include-avatar: $md-list-include-avatar, $include-two-lines: $md-list-include-two-lines, $include-three-lines: $md-list-include-three-lines, $include-dense-icons: $md-font-icon-include-dense) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the media queries and styles for lists on mobile devices and desktop screens.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $include-icon

    Boolean if the styles for lists with icons should be included.

    		Boolean$md-list-include-icon
    $include-avatar

    Boolean if the styles for lists with avatars should be included.

    		Boolean$md-list-include-avatar
    $include-two-lines

    Boolean if the styles for lists with two lines of text should be included.

    		Boolean$md-list-include-two-lines
    $include-three-lines

    Boolean if the styles for lists with three lines of text should be included.

    		Boolean$md-list-include-three-lines
    $include-dense-icons

    Boolean if the dense styles for icons should be included.

    		Boolean$md-font-icon-include-dense

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-lists-media;

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-lists-mobile
    • [mixin] react-md-lists-desktop
    • [variable] md-list-padding
    • [variable] md-list-primary-font-size
    • [variable] md-list-secondary-font-size
    • [variable] md-list-height
    • [variable] md-list-avatar-height
    • [variable] md-list-two-lines-height
    • [variable] md-list-three-lines-height
    • [variable] md-mobile-media
    • [variable] md-font-icon-size
    • [variable] md-font-icon-dense-size
    • [variable] md-desktop-media

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-lists

    lists, themes

    mixins

    react-md-theme-lists

    @mixin react-md-theme-lists($light-theme: $md-light-theme) { ... }

    Description

    Updates the theme for lists ONLY if the $light-theme does not equal the $md-light-theme.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $light-theme

    Boolean if the lists should be themed by the light theme.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-theme-lists(!$md-light-theme);

    Requires

    • [function] get-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [variable] md-light-theme

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-everything
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-everything

    media

    variables

    md-media-aspect-ratios

    $md-media-aspect-ratios: ('16:9', '4:3', '1:1') !default;

    Description

    The default aspect ratios to include.

    Type

    List

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-media

    md-media-include-overlay

    $md-media-include-overlay: true !default;

    Description

    A boolean if the overlay styles should be included.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-media-include-embedded

    $md-media-include-embedded: false !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the .md-media-embedded class name should be included.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-media-embedded-selectors

    $md-media-embedded-selectors: ('img' 'iframe' 'svg') !default;

    Description

    A list of class name or html tags that will get the embedded media styles applied by default in the .md-media container.

    Type

    List

    md-media-overlay-color

    $md-media-overlay-color: rgba($md-black-base, .54) !default;

    Description

    The color to use for the media overlay's background color.

    Type

    Color

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-media-overlay

    placeholders

    md-media-embedded

    %md-media-embedded { ... }

    Description

    A placeholder for making a class or html element use the embedded styles. This class or element will need to be contained in a class containing .md-media to get the correct styles.

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-media
    • [mixin] react-md-media-embedded

    mixins

    react-md-media

    @mixin react-md-media($include-overlay: $md-media-include-overlay, $include-embedded: $md-media-include-embedded, $embedded-selectors: $md-media-embedded-selectors) { ... }

    Description

    Creates the styles for media.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $include-overlay

    Boolean if the overlay styles should be included.

    		Boolean$md-media-include-overlay
    $include-embedded

    Boolean if the embedded class name should be included. This does not affect the $embedded-selectors param.

    		Boolean$md-media-include-embedded
    $embedded-selectors

    A list of class name or html tags to apply the embedded styles to by default within a .md-media container.

    		List$md-media-embedded-selectors

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-media;

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-media-aspect-ratio
    • [mixin] react-md-media-overlay
    • [mixin] react-md-media-embedded
    • [placeholder] md-media-embedded
    • [variable] md-media-aspect-ratios

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-everything

    react-md-media-aspect-ratio

    @mixin react-md-media-aspect-ratio($width, $height) { ... }

    Description

    Creates a media aspect ratio that will make the .md-media-embedded\ or any of the $md-media-embedded-selectors children keep the aspect ratio.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $width

    The width to enforce.

    		Number— none
    $height

    The height to enforce.

    		Number— none

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-media-aspect-ratio(16, 9);

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-media

    react-md-media-embedded

    @mixin react-md-media-embedded() { ... }

    Description

    Very simple mixin to only include the .md-media-embedded class.

    Parameters

    None.

    Requires

    • [placeholder] md-media-embedded

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-media

    react-md-media-overlay

    @mixin react-md-media-overlay() { ... }

    Description

    Creates the styles for the media overlay.

    Parameters

    None.

    Requires

    • [function] get-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [variable] md-media-overlay-color

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-media

    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-media
    • [mixin] react-md-tooltips-media
    • [mixin] react-md-typography-media

    md-media-included

    $md-media-included: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the media queries should be included by default for all component mixins. Set this to false if you want to manually include them. It is really only beneficial if you want to join all media queries into one, but you can always use a postcss plugin to combine them if you are worried about bundle size.

    Type

    Boolean

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-everything

    media-queries, icons

    mixins

    react-md-icons-media

    @mixin react-md-icons-media($include-dense: $md-font-icon-include-dense) { ... }

    Description

    Creates the media queries for icons. This really only is used for the dense spec of icons.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $include-dense

    Boolean if the dense specs for icons shoul be included.

    		Boolean$md-font-icon-include-dense

    • [mixin] react-md-icons-dense

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-icons

    menus

    variables

    md-menu-include-cascading

    $md-menu-include-cascading: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the cascading menu styles should be included. This will update the collapser icon to be rotated to the side.

    Type

    {boolean}

    See

    • [variable] md-menu-include-cascading-styles

    md-menu-include-cascading-styles

    $md-menu-include-cascading-styles: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the additional styles for cascading menus should be included. I'm not really sure why these styles are part of the spec.

    Type

    Boolean

    See

    • [variable] md-menu-cascading-font-size
    • [variable] md-menu-cascading-height
    • [variable] md-menu-cascading-padding
    • [variable] md-menu-cascading-list-padding

    md-menu-units-width

    $md-menu-units-width: 56px !default;

    Description

    The width for a menu's unit. I don't really get it myself. It is a part of the material design specs though.

    Type

    Number

    md-menu-transition-time

    Deprecated!
    $md-menu-transition-time: null !default;

    Description

    The transition time to use for menus type Number

    md-menu-min-width

    $md-menu-min-width: $md-menu-units-width * 2 !default;

    Description

    The min width to apply to menus. If this value is set, the mobile/desktop values will not be used.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-menus
    • [mixin] react-md-menus-mobile
    • [mixin] react-md-menus-mobile
    • [mixin] react-md-menus-desktop
    • [mixin] react-md-menus-desktop
    • [mixin] react-md-menus-media

    See

    • [variable] md-menu-mobile-min-width
    • [variable] md-menu-desktop-min-width

    md-menu-max-width

    $md-menu-max-width: null !default;

    Description

    The max width to apply to menus. If this value is set, the mobile/desktop values will not be used.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    Type

    Type

    See

    • [variable] md-menu-min-width

    md-menu-mobile-max-width

    Type

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-menus-mobile

    $md-menu-cascading-padding: 24px !default;

    Description

    The padding to use for cascading menus.

    Type

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-menus-cascading
    • [mixin] react-md-menus-cascading

    md-menu-cascading-height

    $md-menu-cascading-height: 32px !default;

    Description

    The Height to use for each list item in a cascading menu.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-menus-cascading

    md-menu-cascading-list-padding

    $md-menu-cascading-list-padding: 16px !default;

    Description

    The amount of padding to add to the top and bottom of a list in a cascading menu.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-menus-cascading
    • [mixin] react-md-menus-cascading

    mixins

    react-md-menus

    @mixin react-md-menus($include-media: $md-media-included, $include-cascading: $md-menu-include-cascading) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for menus.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $include-media

    Boolean if the media queries are included for menus.

    		Boolean$md-media-included
    $include-cascading

    Boolean if the desktop cascading styles for menus should be included.

    		Boolean$md-menu-include-cascading

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-menus;

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-menus-cascading
    • [mixin] react-md-menus-media
    • [variable] md-menu-max-width
    • [variable] md-menu-min-width
    • [variable] md-menu-z-index
    • [variable] md-menu-max-height

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-everything

    react-md-menus-cascading

    @mixin react-md-menus-cascading($include-cascading-styles: $md-menu-include-cascading-styles) { ... }

    Description

    Creates the styles for cascading menus. This really just rotates the collapser icon to change from vertical to horizontal.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $include-cascading-styles

    Boolean if the material design spec styles should also be included. This changes font-size, padding, and height of the items in a cascading menu.

    		Boolean$md-menu-include-cascading-styles

    Requires

    • [variable] md-desktop-media
    • [variable] md-menu-cascading-list-padding
    • [variable] md-menu-cascading-list-padding
    • [variable] md-menu-cascading-padding
    • [variable] md-menu-cascading-padding
    • [variable] md-menu-cascading-height
    • [variable] md-menu-cascading-font-size

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-menus

    menus, media-queries

    mixins

    react-md-menus-mobile

    @mixin react-md-menus-mobile() { ... }

    Description

    Creates the styles for menus on mobile devices. This should normally be used a media query.

    Parameters

    None.

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @media #{$md-mobile-media} {
  @include react-md-menus-mobile;
}

    Requires

    • [variable] md-menu-max-width
    • [variable] md-menu-min-width
    • [variable] md-menu-max-width
    • [variable] md-menu-mobile-max-width
    • [variable] md-menu-min-width
    • [variable] md-menu-mobile-min-width
    • [variable] md-menu-max-height
    • [variable] md-menu-mobile-max-height

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-menus-media

    react-md-menus-desktop

    @mixin react-md-menus-desktop() { ... }

    Description

    Creates the styles for menus on desktop screens. This should normally be used a media query.

    Parameters

    None.

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @media #{$md-desktop-media} {
  @include react-md-menus-desktop;
}

    Requires

    • [variable] md-menu-max-width
    • [variable] md-menu-min-width
    • [variable] md-menu-max-width
    • [variable] md-menu-desktop-max-width
    • [variable] md-menu-min-width
    • [variable] md-menu-desktop-min-width
    • [variable] md-menu-max-height
    • [variable] md-menu-desktop-max-height

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-menus-media

    react-md-menus-media

    @mixin react-md-menus-media() { ... }

    Description

    Includes the media queries for menus on mobile devices and desktop screens.

    Parameters

    None.

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-menus-media;

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-menus-mobile
    • [mixin] react-md-menus-desktop
    • [variable] md-menu-max-height
    • [variable] md-menu-max-width
    • [variable] md-menu-min-width
    • [variable] md-mobile-media
    • [variable] md-desktop-media

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-menus

    menus, z-indexes

    variables

    md-menu-z-index

    $md-menu-z-index: null !default;

    Description

    The z-index to use for menus. This is really only if the z-index for a layover is not preferred.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-menus

    See

    • [variable] md-btn-fixed-z-index
    • [variable] md-dialog-full-page-z-index
    • [variable] md-dialog-overlay-z-index
    • [variable] md-drawer-z-index

    • [variable] md-picker-inline-z-index
    • [variable] md-snackbar-z-index
    • [variable] md-toolbar-z-index

    navigation-drawers

    variables

    md-navigation-drawer-enforce-height

    $md-navigation-drawer-enforce-height: false !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the navigation drawer's content should use the height attribute instead of the max-height. When this is true, only the content will be scrollable instead of the entire window.

    Type

    Boolean

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers

    md-navigation-drawer-include-cross-fade

    $md-navigation-drawer-include-cross-fade: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the cross-fade transiiton should be included. This is used when the content changes.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-navigation-drawer-title-offset

    $md-navigation-drawer-title-offset: 20px !default;

    Description

    A margin-left that should also get applied to the navigation drawer's title when being positioned next to a permanent or persistent open drawer.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers
    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers-tablet
    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers-desktop

    md-cross-fade-transition-time

    $md-cross-fade-transition-time: $md-transition-time * 2 !default;

    Description

    The transition time for the cross-fade transition.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers

    md-cross-fade-distance

    $md-cross-fade-distance: 16px !default;

    Description

    The distance that the new content should move during the cross-fade transition.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers

    mixins

    react-md-navigation-drawers

    @mixin react-md-navigation-drawers($include-media: $md-media-included, $include-cross-fade: $md-navigation-drawer-include-cross-fade) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for navigation drawers. This really depends on the styles for toolbars and drawers.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $include-media

    Boolean if the media queries should be included.

    		Boolean$md-media-included
    $include-cross-fade

    Boolean if the cross fade transiiton should be included.

    		Boolean$md-navigation-drawer-include-cross-fade

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-navigation-drawers;

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers-media
    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawer-height
    • [mixin] md-ios-scroll-momentum
    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawer-height
    • [variable] md-drawer-z-index
    • [variable] md-drawer-transition-time
    • [variable] md-toolbar-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-height
    • [variable] md-navigation-drawer-enforce-height
    • [variable] md-drawer-transition-time
    • [variable] md-toolbar-prominent-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-prominent-height
    • [variable] md-drawer-tablet-width
    • [variable] md-navigation-drawer-title-offset
    • [variable] md-cross-fade-distance
    • [variable] md-cross-fade-transition-time

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-everything

    See

    • [mixin] react-md-drawers
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars

    react-md-navigation-drawer-height

    @mixin react-md-navigation-drawer-height($toolbar-height, $enforce-height: $md-navigation-drawer-enforce-height) { ... }

    Description

    This is mostly an internal mixin for either setting the height or min-height for the navigation drawer's content.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $toolbar-height

    The current toolbar height.

    		Number— none
    $enforce-height

    Boolean if the height should be enforced instead of setting the min-height.

    		Boolean$md-navigation-drawer-enforce-height

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers
    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers
    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers-mobile
    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers-mobile-landscape
    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers-mobile-landscape
    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers-tablet
    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers-tablet
    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers-desktop
    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers-desktop

    navigation-drawers, media-queries

    mixins

    react-md-navigation-drawers-mobile

    @mixin react-md-navigation-drawers-mobile($enforce-height: $md-navigation-drawer-enforce-height) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for the navigation drawer content on mobile devices. This should be used within a media query.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $enforce-height

    Boolean if the drawer's content height should be strictly enforced. This will use the height attribute instead of the max-height.

    		Boolean$md-navigation-drawer-enforce-height

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @media #{$md-mobile-media} {
  @include react-md-navigation-drawers-portrait;
}

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawer-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-mobile-portrait-height

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers-media

    react-md-navigation-drawers-mobile-landscape

    @mixin react-md-navigation-drawers-mobile-landscape($enforce-height: $md-navigation-drawer-enforce-height) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for the navigation drawer content on mobile landscape devices. This should be used within a media query.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $enforce-height

    Boolean if the drawer's content height should be strictly enforced. This will use the height attribute instead of the max-height.

    		Boolean$md-navigation-drawer-enforce-height

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @media #{$md-mobile-landscape-media} {
  @include react-md-navigation-drawers-mobile-landscape;
}

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawer-height
    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawer-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-mobile-landscape-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-prominent-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-mobile-prominent-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-mobile-prominent-height

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers-media

    react-md-navigation-drawers-desktop

    @mixin react-md-navigation-drawers-desktop($enforce-height: $md-navigation-drawer-enforce-height, $include-dense-icons: $md-font-icon-include-dense) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for the navigation drawer content on desktop screens. This should be used within a media query.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $enforce-height

    Boolean if the drawer's content height should be strictly enforced. This will use the height attribute instead of the max-height.

    		Boolean$md-navigation-drawer-enforce-height
    $include-dense-icons

    Boolean if the dense font icons should be included.

    		Boolean$md-font-icon-include-dense

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @media #{$md-desktop-media} {
  @include react-md-navigation-drawers-desktop;
}

    Requires

    • [variable] md-toolbar-prominent-height

    • [variable] md-toolbar-desktop-prominent-height
    • [variable] md-drawer-tablet-width
    • [variable] md-drawer-desktop-width
    • [variable] md-drawer-desktop-width
    • [variable] md-btn-icon-dense-size
    • [variable] md-btn-icon-size
    • [variable] md-btn-icon-dense-padding
    • [variable] md-btn-icon-padding
    • [variable] md-navigation-drawer-title-offset

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers-media

    react-md-navigation-drawers-media

    @mixin react-md-navigation-drawers-media($enforce-height: $md-navigation-drawer-enforce-height, $include-dense-icons: $md-font-icon-include-dense) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the media queries and styles for navigation drawers.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $enforce-height

    Boolean if the drawer's content height should be strictly enforced. This will use the height attribute instead of the max-height.

    		Boolean$md-navigation-drawer-enforce-height
    $include-dense-icons

    Boolean if the dense font icons should be included.

    		Boolean$md-font-icon-include-dense

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-navigation-drawers-media;

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers-mobile

    • [variable] md-mobile-landscape-media

    • [variable] md-desktop-media

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers

    papers

    variables

    md-paper-transition-time

    $md-paper-transition-time: $md-transition-time * 2 !default;

    Description

    The defualt transition time for the paper to raise from 0 to 3

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-papers

    mixins

    react-md-papers

    @mixin react-md-papers() { ... }

    Description

    Creates the styles for paper.

    Parameters

    None.

    Requires

    • [mixin] md-box-shadow
    • [mixin] md-box-shadow
    • [variable] md-desktop-media
    • [variable] md-paper-transition-time

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-everything

    md-box-shadow

    @mixin md-box-shadow($elevation) { ... }

    Description

    Generates the box shadow for material design

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $elevation

    The material design elevation. This should be a number from 0 - 5.

    		Number— none

    Example

    Basic Usage Sass

    .md-paper--1 {
  @include md-box-shadow(1);
}

.md-paper--5 {
  @include md-box-shadow(5);
}

    Basic Usage CSS Output

    .md-paper--1 {
  box-shadow: 0 2px 2px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, .14). 0 1px 5px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, .12), 0 3px 1px -2px rgba(0, 0, 0, .2);
}

.md-paper--5 {
  box-shadow: 0 16px 24px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, .14), 0 6px 30px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, .12), 0 8px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, .4);
}

    Requires

    • [variable] md-black-base
    • [variable] md-black-base
    • [variable] md-black-base

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-buttons
    • [mixin] react-md-buttons
    • [mixin] react-md-buttons
    • [mixin] react-md-buttons
    • [mixin] react-md-chips
    • [mixin] react-md-papers
    • [mixin] react-md-papers
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-base
    • [mixin] react-md-selection-controls-switch

    Links

    • Polymer Box Shadow

    pickers

    variables

    md-picker-include-date

    $md-picker-include-date: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the date picker styles should be included.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-picker-include-time

    $md-picker-include-time: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the time picker styles should be included.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-picker-include-forceful-classes

    $md-picker-include-forceful-classes: false !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the classes to force a certain orientation should be included. This is not set by default because it is recommended to just allow device orientation to determine the orientation of the picker.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-picker-portrait-width

    $md-picker-portrait-width: 320px !default;

    Description

    The width for the the picker while portrait.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-force-orientation
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-make-portrait

    md-picker-portrait-content-height

    $md-picker-portrait-content-height: 340px !default;

    Description

    The height for the picker's content while portrait.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-make-portrait

    md-picker-portrait-header-height

    $md-picker-portrait-header-height: 110px !default;

    Description

    The height for the picker's header while portrait.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-make-portrait

    md-picker-landscape-width

    $md-picker-landscape-width: 560px !default;

    Description

    The width for the the picker while landscape.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-make-landscape
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-make-landscape

    md-picker-landscape-content-height

    $md-picker-landscape-content-height: 280px !default;

    Description

    The height for the picker's content while landscape.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-make-landscape
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-make-landscape

    md-picker-landscape-header-width

    $md-picker-landscape-header-width: 180px !default;

    Description

    The height for the picker's header while landscape.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-make-landscape
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-make-landscape
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-media

    md-picker-mobile-margin

    $md-picker-mobile-margin: 16px !default;

    Description

    The minimal about of margin for pickers on mobile devices. This is used when placing the picker in a dialog. The width and height can be larger than the default allowed margin for dialogs, so this will update those margins.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-base
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-base
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-media
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-media

    md-picker-mobile-max-size

    $md-picker-mobile-max-size: 320px !default;

    Description

    This is an optional fix for devices that have a really small width (iphone 5). This will add an additional media query to hack the size of the dialogs to fit the pickers. If this is null, it will not be included.

    Type

    Number

    md-calendar-date-font-size

    $md-calendar-date-font-size: 13px !default;

    Description

    The font size for a date picker's calendar date.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-date

    md-year-font-size

    $md-year-font-size: 16px !default;

    Description

    The font size for a year in the date picker's year picker that has not been focused or selected.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-date

    md-year-focus-font-size

    $md-year-focus-font-size: 20px !default;

    Description

    The font size for a year in the date picker's year picker that has been focused.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-date

    md-year-active-font-size

    $md-year-active-font-size: 24px !default;

    Description

    The font size for a year in the date picker's year picker that has been selected.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-date

    md-date-picker-transition-time

    $md-date-picker-transition-time: $md-transition-time * 2 !default;

    Description

    The transition time to use for the date picker's active date background circle to appear.

    Type

    Number

    md-date-picker-portrait-date-size

    $md-date-picker-portrait-date-size: 44px !default;

    Description

    The size for a date in the date picker's calendar while portrait.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-make-portrait

    md-date-picker-portrait-ball-size

    $md-date-picker-portrait-ball-size: 36px !default;

    Description

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    md-date-picker-landscape-ball-size

    $md-date-picker-landscape-ball-size: 32px !default;

    Description

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-make-landscape
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-make-landscape

    md-clock-portrait-size

    Description

    The size for the time picker's clock on while portrait.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-make-portrait
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-make-portrait
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-make-portrait
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-make-portrait

    md-clock-landscape-size

    $md-clock-landscape-size: $md-picker-landscape-content-height - $md-dialog-padding - ($md-dialog-padding / 2) !default;

    Description

    The size for the time picker's clock while landscape.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-make-landscape
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-make-landscape
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-make-landscape
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-make-landscape

    md-clock-time-size

    $md-clock-time-size: 36px !default;

    Description

    The size of an hour or minute on the time picker's clock.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-time
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-time
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-time
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-time

    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-make-portrait
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-make-portrait
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-make-landscape
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-make-landscape

    md-clock-hand-ball-size

    $md-clock-hand-ball-size: 6px !default;

    Description

    The size for the clock hand's ball. This is the circle the surrounds the current time.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-time
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-time
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-time

    md-clock-hand-ball-scale

    $md-clock-hand-ball-scale: .4 !default;

    Description

    The scale to use for the clock hand's ball when it is currently over a minute that is not divisible by 5.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-time

    md-clock-padding

    $md-clock-padding: 4px !default;

    Description

    The padding from the outside edge of the clock to the edge of one of the time circles.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-time
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-make-portrait
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-make-portrait
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-make-landscape
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-make-landscape

    mixins

    react-md-pickers

    @mixin react-md-pickers($primary-color: $md-primary-color, $light-theme: $md-light-theme, $include-media: $md-media-included, $include-date: $md-picker-include-date, $include-time: $md-picker-include-time, $include-forceful-classes: $md-picker-include-forceful-classes) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for date and time pickers. If the $include-date and $include-time parameters are both false, no styles will be created.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $primary-color

    The primary color to style with.

    		Color$md-primary-color
    $light-theme

    Boolean if styling with the light theme.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme
    $include-media

    Boolean if the media queries should be included.

    		Boolean$md-media-included
    $include-date

    Boolean if the date picker styles should be included.

    		Boolean$md-picker-include-date
    $include-time

    Boolean if the time picker styles should be included.

    		Boolean$md-picker-include-time
    $include-forceful-classes

    Boolean if the .md-picker--portrait and .md-picker--landscape classes should be included.

    		Boolean$md-picker-include-forceful-classes

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-pickers;

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-base
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-media
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-date
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-time

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-everything

    react-md-pickers-base

    @mixin react-md-pickers-base($primary-color: $md-primary-color, $light-theme: $md-light-theme, $include-forceful-classes: $md-picker-include-forceful-classes) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the base styles for pickers. This is styles that is used for both date and time pickers. This is normally used within the react-md-pickers mixin.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $primary-color

    The primary color to style with.

    		Color$md-primary-color
    $light-theme

    Boolean if styling with the light theme.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme
    $include-forceful-classes

    Boolean if the .md-picker--portrait and .md-picker--landscape classes should be included.

    		Boolean$md-picker-include-forceful-classes

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-pickers-base;

    Requires

    • [mixin] md-box-shadow
    • [mixin] md-ios-scroll-momentum
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-force-orientation
    • [function] get-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [placeholder] md-text-left
    • [variable] md-picker-inline-z-index
    • [variable] md-font-icon-size
    • [variable] md-default-padding
    • [variable] md-transition-time
    • [variable] md-font-medium
    • [variable] md-picker-mobile-margin
    • [variable] md-picker-mobile-margin
    • [variable] md-dialog-padding

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-pickers

    react-md-pickers-force-orientation

    @mixin react-md-pickers-force-orientation() { ... }

    Description

    This includes the styles that force a certain orientation. These styles are usually not included by default because it is best to allow the device's orientation to determine the orientation of the picker.

    You can either update the $md-pickers-include-forceful-classes variable before using the react-md-everything / react-md-pickers mixins, or manually use this mixin.

    Parameters

    None.

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS - Everything

    $md-pickers-include-forceful-classes: true;
@include react-md-everything;

    Example Usage SCSS - Pickers

    $md-pickers-include-forceful-classes: true;
@include react-md-pickers;

    Example Usage SCSS - Pickers Param

    @include react-md-pickers($md-primary-color, $md-light-theme, $md-media-included, $md-pickers-include-date, $md-pickers-include-time, true);

    Example Usage SCSS - Standalone

    @include react-md-pickers-force-orientation;

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-make-portrait
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-make-landscape
    • [variable] md-picker-portrait-width
    • [variable] md-dialog-padding

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-base

    See

    • [variable] md-picker-include-forceful-classes
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers
    • [mixin] react-md-everything

    react-md-pickers-make-portrait

    @mixin react-md-pickers-make-portrait($include-date: $md-picker-include-date, $include-time: $md-picker-include-time) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for a picker to be displayed in a portrait display.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $include-date

    Boolean if the date picker styles should be included.

    		Boolean$md-picker-include-date
    $include-time

    Boolean if the time picker styles should be included.

    		Boolean$md-picker-include-time

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @media (orientation: portrait) {
  .md-picker {
    @include react-md-pickers-make-portrait;
  }
}

    Requires

    • [variable] md-picker-portrait-width
    • [variable] md-picker-portrait-header-height
    • [variable] md-dialog-padding
    • [variable] md-picker-portrait-content-height

    • [variable] md-date-picker-portrait-ball-size
    • [variable] md-date-picker-portrait-ball-size
    • [variable] md-clock-portrait-size
    • [variable] md-clock-portrait-size
    • [variable] md-clock-portrait-size
    • [variable] md-clock-padding
    • [variable] md-clock-time-size
    • [variable] md-clock-portrait-size
    • [variable] md-clock-padding
    • [variable] md-clock-time-size

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-force-orientation

    react-md-pickers-make-landscape

    @mixin react-md-pickers-make-landscape($include-date: $md-picker-include-date, $include-time: $md-picker-include-time) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for a picker to be displayed in a landscape display.

    		Boolean$md-picker-include-date
    $include-time

    		Boolean$md-picker-include-time

    pickers, media-queries

    mixins

    react-md-pickers-media

    @mixin react-md-pickers-media() { ... }

    Description

    Includes the media queries for pickers only if $include-date or $include-time are true. This is normally used just within the react-md-pickers mixin.

    Parameters

    None.

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-pickers-media;

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-make-portrait
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-make-landscape
    • [variable] md-picker-mobile-margin
    • [variable] md-picker-landscape-header-width
    • [variable] md-picker-mobile-margin

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-pickers

    See

    • [mixin] react-md-pickers

    pickers, themes

    mixins

    react-md-theme-pickers

    @mixin react-md-theme-pickers($primary-color: $md-primary-color, $light-theme: $md-light-theme, $include-date: $md-picker-include-date, $include-time: $md-picker-include-time) { ... }

    Description

    Themes the pickers with the new colors only if the primary-color does not equal the md-primary-color, or the light-theme does not equal the md-light-theme and at least one of include-date or include-time are true.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $primary-color

    The primary color to style with.

    		Color$md-primary-color
    $light-theme

    Boolean if styling with the light theme.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme
    $include-date

    Boolean if the date picker styles should be included.

    		Boolean$md-picker-include-date
    $include-time

    Boolean if the time picker styles should be included.

    		Boolean$md-picker-include-time

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-theme-pickers($md-orange-500, true);

    Requires

    • [function] get-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [variable] md-light-theme
    • [variable] md-primary-color
    • [variable] md-grey-100

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-everything
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-everything
