    progress

    variables

    md-progress-include-circular

    $md-progress-include-circular: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the circular progress bars should be included.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-progress-include-linear

    $md-progress-include-linear: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the linear progress bars should be included.

    Type

    Boolean

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-everything
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-everything

    md-progress-margin

    $md-progress-margin: 1em !default;

    Description

    The top and bottom margin to apply to the circular and linear progress.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-progress
    • [mixin] react-md-progress

    md-progress-duration

    $md-progress-duration: 2.4s !default;

    Description

    The duration for one cycle of the circular progress animation.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-progress-circular
    • [mixin] react-md-progress-circular
    • [mixin] react-md-progress-linear
    • [mixin] react-md-progress-linear

    md-circular-progress-stroke-dasharray

    $md-circular-progress-stroke-dasharray: 187px !default;

    Description

    The initial stroke-dasharray for the indetermate progress. I have no idea how this stuff works.. So change have fun changing that.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-progress-circular
    • [mixin] react-md-progress-circular
    • [mixin] react-md-progress-circular
    • [mixin] react-md-progress-circular

    md-linear-progress-height

    $md-linear-progress-height: 3px !default;

    Description

    The linear progress's bar height.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-progress-linear

    md-linear-progress-delay

    $md-linear-progress-delay: 1.15s !default;

    Description

    The amount of time the animation should delay for linear progress bars.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-progress-linear

    md-linear-progress-swatch

    $md-linear-progress-swatch: 100 !default;

    Description

    The default swatch to use for the default linear progress bar background. This should be either: 100, 200, 400, or 700.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-progress-linear

    mixins

    react-md-progress

    @mixin react-md-progress($secondary-color: $md-secondary-color, $linear-swatch: $md-linear-progress-swatch, $include-circular: $md-progress-include-circular, $include-linear: $md-progress-include-linear) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for progress bars if either $include-circular and/or $include-linear are true.

    Progress bars are always styled with the secondary-color. When using a linear progress bar, the default background will be a swatch that is ligher than the secondary-color.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $secondary-color

    The secondary color to theme progress bars with.

    		Color$md-secondary-color
    $linear-swatch

    The swatch number to use for a linear progress bar's default background. This should be either 100, 200, 400, or 700.

    		Number$md-linear-progress-swatch
    $include-circular

    Boolean if the circular progress styles should be included.

    		Boolean$md-progress-include-circular
    $include-linear

    Boolean if the linear progress styles should be included.

    		Boolean$md-progress-include-linear

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-progress-circular
    • [mixin] react-md-progress-linear
    • [variable] md-progress-margin
    • [variable] md-progress-margin

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-everything

    react-md-progress-circular

    @mixin react-md-progress-circular($secondary-color: $md-secondary-color) { ... }

    Description

    Creates the styles for a circular progress bar.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $secondary-color

    The secondary color to theme with.

    		Color$md-secondary-color

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-progress-circular;

    Requires

    • [variable] md-transition-time
    • [variable] md-progress-duration
    • [variable] md-circular-progress-stroke-dasharray
    • [variable] md-progress-duration
    • [variable] md-circular-progress-stroke-dasharray
    • [variable] md-circular-progress-stroke-dasharray
    • [variable] md-circular-progress-stroke-dasharray

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-progress

    react-md-progress-linear

    @mixin react-md-progress-linear($secondary-color: $md-secondary-color, $swatch: $md-linear-progress-swatch, $fallback-color: $md-linear-progress) { ... }

    Description

    Creates the styles for a linear progress bar.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $secondary-color

    The secondary color to theme with.

    		Color$md-secondary-color
    $swatch

    The swatch to use for the unmoving background.

    		Number$md-linear-progress-swatch
    $fallback-color

    An optional fallback color to use when the secondary color is not a valid material design color.

    		Color$md-linear-progress

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-progress-linear;

    Requires

    • [function] get-swatch
    • [variable] md-linear-progress-height
    • [variable] md-progress-duration
    • [variable] md-transition-standard
    • [variable] md-linear-progress-delay
    • [variable] md-progress-duration
    • [variable] md-transition-acceleration

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-progress

    progress, themes

    variables

    md-linear-progress-fallback-color

    $md-linear-progress-fallback-color: null !default;

    Description

    An optional fallback color to use for the linear progress's background. This is only required when the $md-secondary-color is not a valid material design color.

    Type

    Color

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-progress-linear

    See

    • [function] get-swatch

    mixins

    react-md-theme-progress

    @mixin react-md-theme-progress($secondary-color: $md-secondary-color, $linear-swatch: $md-linear-progress-swatch, $include-circular: $md-progress-include-circular, $include-linear: $md-progress-include-linear, $fallback-color: $md-linear-progress) { ... }

    Description

    Updates the theme for progress bars.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $secondary-color

    The secondary color to theme progress bars with.

    		Color$md-secondary-color
    $linear-swatch

    The swatch number to use for a linear progress bar's default background. This should be either 100, 200, 400, or 700.

    		Number$md-linear-progress-swatch
    $include-circular

    Boolean if the circular progress styles should be included.

    		Boolean$md-progress-include-circular
    $include-linear

    Boolean if the linear progress styles should be included.

    		Boolean$md-progress-include-linear
    $fallback-color

    An optional fallback color to use when the secondary color is not a valid material design color.

    		Color$md-linear-progress

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-theme-progress($md-deep-orange-a-700, 200);

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-progress-circular
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-progress-linear

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-everything
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-everything

    react-md-theme-progress-circular

    @mixin react-md-theme-progress-circular($secondary-color: $md-secondary-color) { ... }

    Description

    Themes the circular progress bars only when the $secondary-color does not equal the $md-secondary-color.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $secondary-color

    The secondary color to theme progress bars with.

    		Color$md-secondary-color

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-theme-progress-circular($md-orange-a-700);

    Requires

    • [variable] md-secondary-color

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-progress

    react-md-theme-progress-linear

    @mixin react-md-theme-progress-linear($secondary-color: $md-secondary-color, $swatch: $md-linear-progress-swatch, $fallback-color: $md-linear-progress) { ... }

    Description

    Themes only the linear progress bars when the $secondary-color does not equal the $md-secondary-color OR the $swatch does not equal the $md-linear-progress-swatch.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $secondary-color

    The secondary color to theme progress bars with.

    		Color$md-secondary-color
    $swatch

    The swatch number to use for a linear progress bar's default background. This should be either 100, 200, 400, or 700.

    		Number$md-linear-progress-swatch
    $fallback-color

    An optional fallback color to use when the secondary color is not a valid material design color.

    		Color$md-linear-progress

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-theme-progress-linear($md-orange-a-700, 200);

    Requires

    • [function] get-swatch
    • [variable] md-secondary-color
    • [variable] md-secondary-color
    • [variable] md-linear-progress-swatch
    • [variable] md-linear-progress-fallback-color

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-progress

    select-fields

    variables

    md-select-field-drop-distance

    $md-select-field-drop-distance: 6px !default;

    Description

    The distance that a new value for the select field should drop.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-select-fields-drop-transition

    md-select-field-drop-transition-time

    $md-select-field-drop-transition-time: $md-transition-time * 2 !default;

    Description

    The transition time that a new value in a select field should drop.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-select-fields-drop-transition

    md-select-field-left-padding

    $md-select-field-left-padding: 24px !default;

    Description

    The left padding for a select field that has a postition of SelectField.Positions.BELOW

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-data-table-select-fields
    • [mixin] react-md-select-fields

    md-select-field-right-padding

    $md-select-field-right-padding: 16px !default;

    Description

    The right padding for a select field that has a postition of SelectField.Positions.BELOW

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-select-fields

    mixins

    react-md-select-fields

    @mixin react-md-select-fields($include-media: $md-media-included) { ... }

    Description

    Creates the styles for select fields. Like the autocompletes, the SelectField component also depends on the styles for the TextField.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $include-media

    Boolean if the media queries for select fields should also be included.

    		Boolean$md-media-included

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-select-fields;

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-select-fields-drop-transition
    • [mixin] react-md-select-fields-media
    • [variable] md-default-padding
    • [variable] md-select-field-left-padding
    • [variable] md-select-field-right-padding
    • [variable] md-default-padding

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-everything

    See

    • [mixin] react-md-text-fields

    react-md-select-fields-drop-transition

    @mixin react-md-select-fields-drop-transition() { ... }

    Description

    Creates the drop down transition for a new value appearing in the select field. This is included in the react-md-select-fields mixin, so it might not be used on its own.

    Parameters

    None.

    Requires

    • [variable] md-select-field-drop-distance
    • [variable] md-select-field-drop-transition-time

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-select-fields

    select-fields, media-queries

    mixins

    react-md-select-fields-mobile

    @mixin react-md-select-fields-mobile() { ... }

    Description

    Creates the styles for select fields on a mobile device. This should normally be used within a media query.

    Parameters

    None.

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @media #{$md-mobile-media} {
  @include react-md-select-fields-mobile;
}

    Requires

    • [variable] md-text-field-mobile-height

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-select-fields-media

    react-md-select-fields-desktop

    @mixin react-md-select-fields-desktop() { ... }

    Description

    Creates the styles for select fields on a desktop screen. This should normally be used within a media query.

    Parameters

    None.

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @media #{$md-desktop-media} {
  @include react-md-select-fields-desktop;
}

    Requires

    • [variable] md-text-field-desktop-height

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-select-fields-media

    react-md-select-fields-media

    @mixin react-md-select-fields-media() { ... }

    Description

    Creates the media queries and styles for select fields on mobile devices and desktop screens.

    Parameters

    None.

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-select-fields-media;

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-select-fields-mobile
    • [mixin] react-md-select-fields-desktop
    • [variable] md-mobile-media
    • [variable] md-desktop-media

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-select-fields

    selection-controls

    variables

    md-selection-controls-include-group

    $md-selection-controls-include-group: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the very minimal styles for the .md-select-field-group should be included.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-selection-controls-include-switches

    $md-selection-controls-include-switches: true !default;

    Description

    Type

    Type

    Type

    mixins

    react-md-selection-controls

    @mixin react-md-selection-controls($secondary-color: $md-secondary-color, $light-theme: $md-light-theme, $include-group: $md-selection-controls-include-group, $include-switches: $md-selection-controls-include-switches, $include-dense-icons: $md-font-icon-include-dense) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for the Selection Controls.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $secondary-color

    The secondary color to use

    		Color$md-secondary-color
    $light-theme

    Boolean if the selection controls should be styled using the light theme.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme
    $include-group

    Boolean if the minimal styles for the .md-selection-controls-group should be included.

    		Boolean$md-selection-controls-include-group
    $include-switches

    Boolean if the styles for switches should be included.

    		Boolean$md-selection-controls-include-switches
    $include-dense-icons

    boolean if the checkbox and radio controls should be updated for the dense icon spec.

    		Boolean$md-font-icon-include-dense

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-selection-controls;

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-selection-controls-switch
    • [mixin] react-md-selection-controls-media
    • [variable] md-height

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-everything

    react-md-selection-controls-switch

    @mixin react-md-selection-controls-switch($secondary-color: $md-secondary-color, $light-theme: $md-light-theme, $fallback-color: $md-switch-ball-fallback-color) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for the Selection Controls' switch only. The $secondary-color will automatically be switched to the -500 swatch in light themes and the -200 swatch in dark themes.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $secondary-color

    The secondary color to use to theme the switches with.

    		Color$md-secondary-color
    $light-theme

    Boolean if the switch should be styled for the light theme.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme
    $fallback-color

    The fallback color to use for the switch's ball when the $md-secondary-color is not a material design color.

    		Color$md-switch-ball-fallback-color

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-selection-controls-switch;

    Requires

    • [mixin] md-box-shadow
    • [function] get-swatch
    • [variable] md-switch-height
    • [variable] md-switch-track-radius
    • [variable] md-switch-track-height
    • [variable] md-switch-track-width
    • [variable] md-switch-light-theme-track-off
    • [variable] md-switch-dark-theme-track-off
    • [variable] md-switch-light-theme-track-disabled
    • [variable] md-switch-dark-theme-track-disabled
    • [variable] md-switch-thumb-size
    • [variable] md-transition-time
    • [variable] md-switch-thumb-size
    • [variable] md-switch-track-width
    • [variable] md-switch-thumb-size
    • [variable] md-switch-thumb-offset
    • [variable] md-switch-thumb-offset
    • [variable] md-switch-light-theme-thumb-off
    • [variable] md-switch-dark-theme-thumb-off
    • [variable] md-switch-thumb-offset
    • [variable] md-switch-thumb-offset
    • [variable] md-switch-light-theme-thumb-disabled
    • [variable] md-switch-dark-theme-thumb-disabled

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-selection-controls

    selection-controls, themes

    variables

    md-switch-ball-fallback-color

    $md-switch-ball-fallback-color: null !default;

    Description

    An optional fallback color to use for the switch's ball when the the $md-seconary-color is not a material design color.

    Type

    Color

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-selection-controls-switch

    See

    • [function] get-swatch

    mixins

    react-md-theme-selection-controls

    @mixin react-md-theme-selection-controls($secondary-color: $md-secondary-color, $light-theme: $md-light-theme, $incude-switches: $md-selection-controls-include-switches, $fallback-color: $md-switch-ball-fallback-color) { ... }

    Description

    Themes the selection controls with the new theme variables. It really only modifies the switch styles, so if $include-switches param is false, it does nothing.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $secondary-color

    The secondary color to theme with.

    		Color$md-secondary-color
    $light-theme

    Boolean if updating the theme type to light.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme
    $incude-switches

    Boolean if the switches should be included.

    		Boolean$md-selection-controls-include-switches
    $fallback-color

    The fallback color to use for the switch's ball when the $md-secondary-color is not a material design color.

    		Color$md-switch-ball-fallback-color

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-theme-selection-control($md-blue-a-200, true);

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-selection-controls-switch

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-everything
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-everything

    react-md-theme-selection-controls-switch

    @mixin react-md-theme-selection-controls-switch($secondary-color: $md-secondary-color, $light-theme: $md-light-theme, $fallback-color: $md-switch-ball-fallback-color) { ... }

    Description

    Updates the styles for switches ONLY if

    • the $secondary-color does not equal the $md-secondary-color
    • the $light-theme does not equal the $md-light-theme

    The $secondary-color will automatically be updated to be a swatch of -500 for light themes and a swatch of -200 for dark themes.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $secondary-color

    The secondary color to theme with.

    		Color$md-secondary-color
    $light-theme

    Boolean if updating the theme type to light.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme
    $fallback-color

    The fallback color to use for the switch's ball when the $md-secondary-color is not a material design color.

    		Color$md-switch-ball-fallback-color

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-theme-selection-controls-switch($md-blue-a-200, true);

    Requires

    • [function] get-swatch
    • [variable] md-secondary-color
    • [variable] md-switch-ball-fallback-color
    • [variable] md-light-theme
    • [variable] md-switch-light-theme-track-off
    • [variable] md-switch-dark-theme-track-off
    • [variable] md-switch-light-theme-track-disabled
    • [variable] md-switch-dark-theme-track-disabled
    • [variable] md-switch-light-theme-thumb-off
    • [variable] md-switch-dark-theme-thumb-off
    • [variable] md-switch-light-theme-thumb-disabled
    • [variable] md-switch-dark-theme-thumb-disabled

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-selection-controls

    Type

    md-slider-thumb-active-scale

    Description

    The scale to use when the slider is active. This will be applied to the scale transform on the thumb.

    Type

    Used by

    md-slider-thumb-disabled-scale

    Type

    Type

    md-slider-discrete-ink-transition-time

    $md-slider-discrete-ink-transition-time: $md-transition-time * 2 !default;

    Description

    The transition time to use for the Discrete Slider's ink appearance when the user focuses with the keyboard.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-discrete-slider
    • [mixin] react-md-discrete-slider

    md-slider-mask-ink-opacity

    $md-slider-mask-ink-opacity: .15 !default;

    Description

    The opacity to use for the Slider's thumb ink. This will appear when the user focuses with the keybord or touches the slider on a mobile device.

    This opacity will be applied to the $primary-color.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-sliders

    md-slider-discrete-mask-ink-opacity

    $md-slider-discrete-mask-ink-opacity: .3 !default;

    Description

    The opacity to use for the discrete Slider's thumb ink. This will appear when the user focuses with the keybord.

    This opacity will be applied to the $primary-color.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-discrete-slider

    md-slider-light-theme-off-color

    $md-slider-light-theme-off-color: rgba($md-black-base, .26) !default;

    Type

    Used by

    md-slider-dark-theme-off-color

    Description

    The off color to use for the Slider when using the dark theme.

    Type

    Color

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-sliders
    • [mixin] react-md-discrete-slider
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-sliders

    md-slider-warn-md

    $md-slider-warn-md: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the sliders should warn when not using a correct swatch. This warning will only occur when using the dark theme and the primary color does not have a -200 suffix. APPARENTLY this is a requirement for Material Design. Feel free to disable this warning.

    Type

    Boolean

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-sliders
    • [mixin] react-md-discrete-slider
    • [function] validate-slider-primary-color
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-sliders
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-discrete-slider

    See

    • [function] validate-slider-primary-color

    mixins

    react-md-sliders

    @mixin react-md-sliders($primary-color: $md-primary-color, $light-theme: $md-light-theme, $inlude-media: $md-media-included, $include-discrete: $md-slider-include-discrete, $include-editor: $md-slider-include-editor, $include-indicators: $md-slider-include-indiccators) { ... }

    Description

    This includes the react-md Sliders Component scss.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $primary-color

    The primary color to use for the slider. This will be the non-disabled track's fill color and the non-disabled thumb's color. If you are using the dark-theme, This value should be the primary color with a -200 suffix.

    		Color$md-primary-color
    $light-theme

    A boolean if the application using the light theme.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme
    $inlude-media

    Boolean if the media queries should be included.

    		Boolean$md-media-included
    $include-discrete

    A boolean if the discrete slider's scss should be included.

    		Boolean$md-slider-include-discrete
    $include-editor

    A boolean if the editable slider's scss should be included.

    		Boolean$md-slider-include-editor
    $include-indicators

    A boolean if the small scss for displaying indicators/icons with the slider should be included.

    		Boolean$md-slider-include-indiccators

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-discrete-slider
    • [mixin] react-md-editable-slider
    • [mixin] react-md-slider-indicators
    • [function] validate-slider-primary-color
    • [variable] md-colors-warn-md
    • [variable] md-slider-warn-md
    • [variable] md-slider-light-theme-off-color
    • [variable] md-slider-dark-theme-off-color
    • [variable] md-white-base
    • [variable] md-dark-theme-background-color
    • [variable] md-slider-mask-ink-opacity
    • [variable] md-slider-height
    • [variable] md-slider-track-height
    • [variable] md-slider-track-height
    • [variable] md-slider-track-height
    • [variable] md-transition-time
    • [variable] md-slider-thumb-size
    • [variable] md-slider-thumb-size
    • [variable] md-slider-track-height
    • [variable] md-transition-time
    • [variable] md-slider-thumb-size
    • [variable] md-slider-thumb-z-index
    • [variable] md-slider-thumb-active-scale
    • [variable] md-slider-thumb-disabled-scale
    • [variable] md-slider-thumb-z-index
    • [variable] md-slider-thumb-z-index

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-everything

    functions

    validate-slider-primary-color

    @function validate-slider-primary-color($primary-color, $light-theme) { ... }

    Description

    A helper function to validate that a $primary-color has a -200 suffix when using the dark theme. It doesn't actually output anything with sass-loader atm though. :/

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $primary-color

    The primary color to validate.

    		Color— none
    $light-theme

    Boolean if the current theme is the light theme.

    		Boolean— none

    Returns

    Boolean —

    true if the primary color is valid or false if it is invalid.

    Requires

    • [variable] md-color-map
    • [variable] md-slider-warn-md
    • [variable] md-colors-warn-md

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-sliders
    • [mixin] react-md-discrete-slider
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-sliders
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-discrete-slider

    sliders, media-queries

    mixins

    react-md-slider-indicators-mobile

    @mixin react-md-slider-indicators-mobile() { ... }

    Description

    Creates the css for the slider indicators on mobile devices. This should most likely be used within a media query.

    Parameters

    None.

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @media #{$md-mobile-media} {
  @include react-md-slider-indicators-mobile;
}

    Requires

    • [variable] md-text-field-mobile-font-size

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-slider-indicators-media

    react-md-slider-indicators-desktop

    @mixin react-md-slider-indicators-desktop() { ... }

    Description

    Creates the css for the slider indicators on desktop screens. This should most likely be used within a media query.

    Parameters

    None.

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @media #{$md-desktop-media} {
  @include react-md-slider-indicators-desktop;
}

    Requires

    • [variable] md-text-field-desktop-font-size

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-slider-indicators-media

    react-md-slider-indicators-media

    @mixin react-md-slider-indicators-media() { ... }

    Description

    Includes the mobile and desktop media queries for the slider indicators.

    Parameters

    None.

    Example

    Basic Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-slider-indicators-media;

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-slider-indicators-mobile

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-slider-indicators

    sliders, themes

    mixins

    react-md-theme-sliders

    @mixin react-md-theme-sliders($primary-color: $md-primary-color, $light-theme: $md-light-theme, $include-discrete: $md-slider-include-discrete) { ... }

    Description

    This will theme the Slider component with an updated primary-color and optionally a switch in themes.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $primary-color

    The primary color to use for the slider. This will be the non-disabled track's fill color and the non-disabled thumb's color. If you are using the dark-theme, This value should be the primary color with a -200 suffix.

    		Color$md-primary-color
    $light-theme

    A boolean if the application using the light theme.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme
    $include-discrete

    A boolean if the discrete Slider scss should be themed as well.

    		Boolean$md-slider-include-discrete

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-discrete-slider
    • [function] validate-slider-primary-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [variable] md-colors-warn-md
    • [variable] md-slider-warn-md
    • [variable] md-slider-light-theme-off-color
    • [variable] md-slider-dark-theme-off-color
    • [variable] md-white-base
    • [variable] md-dark-theme-background-color
    • [variable] md-primary-color
    • [variable] md-light-theme

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-everything
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-everything

    react-md-theme-discrete-slider

    @mixin react-md-theme-discrete-slider($primary-color: $md-primary-color, $light-theme: $md-light-theme) { ... }

    Description

    This will update the discrete Slider with the new $primary-color.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $primary-color

    The primary color to theme the discrete Slider with.

    		Color$md-primary-color
    $light-theme

    Boolean if the discrete Slider should be themed for the light or dark theme.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme

    Requires

    • [function] validate-slider-primary-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [variable] md-colors-warn-md
    • [variable] md-slider-warn-md
    • [variable] md-primary-color
    • [variable] md-light-theme

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-sliders

    tabs

    variables

    md-tab-include-icons

    $md-tab-include-icons: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the styles for tabs with a label and an icon should be included.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-tab-include-toolbars

    $md-tab-include-toolbars: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the styles for wrapping a toolbar and tabs together should be included.

    Type

    Boolean

    See

    • [mixin] react-md-tabbed-toolbars

    md-tab-include-prominent-toolbars

    $md-tab-include-prominent-toolbars: $md-toolbar-include-prominent !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the styles for offsetting content from a prominent toolbar and tabs should be included.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-tab-include-pagination-overflow

    $md-tab-include-pagination-overflow: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the styles for a pagination tab overflow on desktop screens should be included.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-tab-include-menu-overflow

    $md-tab-include-menu-overflow: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the styles for a menu tab overflow on desktop screens should be included.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-tab-include-swipeable

    $md-tab-include-swipeable: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the mobile swipeable styles should be included.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-tab-height

    $md-tab-height: 48px !default;

    Description

    The height for a tab with only a label or only an icon.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-swipeable
    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-content

    md-tab-icon-height

    $md-tab-icon-height: 72px !default;

    Description

    Type

    Number

    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-content
    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-content

    md-tab-max-width

    $md-tab-max-width: 264px !default;

    Description

    The absolute maximum width for a tab. A tab's width is either the view's width - 56px or this value; whichever is smaller.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-desktop

    mixins

    react-md-tabs

    @mixin react-md-tabs($secondary-color: $md-secondary-color, $include-media: $md-media-included, $include-icons: $md-tab-include-icons, $include-toolbars: $md-tab-include-toolbars, $include-prominent-toolbars: $md-tab-include-prominent-toolbars, $include-pagination-overflow: $md-tab-include-pagination-overflow, $include-menu-overflow: $md-tab-include-menu-overflow, $include-swipeable: $md-tab-include-swipeable, $include-dense-icons: $md-font-icon-include-dense) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the stiles for tabs.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $secondary-color

    The app's secondary color. This is used to style the active tab indicator.

    		Color$md-secondary-color
    $include-media

    Boolean if the media queries should be included with this mixin.

    		Boolean$md-media-included
    $include-icons

    Boolean if the styles for a tab with a label and an icon should be included.

    		Boolean$md-tab-include-icons
    $include-toolbars

    Boolean if the styles for a simple container holding a toolbar and tabs should be included.

    		Boolean$md-tab-include-toolbars
    $include-prominent-toolbars

    Boolean if the styles for the simple container holding a toolbar and tabs should include the prominent toolbar styles.

    		Boolean$md-tab-include-prominent-toolbars
    $include-pagination-overflow

    Boolean if the styles for desktop pagination overflow should be included.

    		Boolean$md-tab-include-pagination-overflow
    $include-menu-overflow

    Boolean if the styles for a drop down menu tab overflow on desktop screens should be included.

    		Boolean$md-tab-include-menu-overflow
    $include-swipeable

    Boolean if the styles for swiping the tab content on mobile devices should be included.

    		Boolean$md-tab-include-swipeable
    $include-dense-icons

    Boolean if the dense spec for icons should be included for tabs.

    		Boolean$md-font-icon-include-dense

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-tabs;

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-tab
    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-indicator
    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-overflow
    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-icon
    • [mixin] react-md-tabbed-toolbars
    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-swipeable
    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-content
    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-media
    • [placeholder] md-list-unstyled
    • [variable] md-white-base
    • [variable] md-toolbar-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-prominent-height

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-everything

    react-md-tabs-tab

    @mixin react-md-tabs-tab($include-icons: $md-tab-include-icons) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for a tab only. This should probably not be used since it is included in the react-md-tabs mixin.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $include-icons

    Boolean if the styles for a tab with a label and icon should be included.

    		Boolean$md-tab-include-icons

    Requires

    • [function] get-color
    • [variable] md-tab-height
    • [variable] md-tab-single-line-padding-bottom
    • [variable] md-tab-padding
    • [variable] md-tab-padding
    • [variable] md-tab-multiline-font-size
    • [variable] md-tab-padding
    • [variable] md-tab-icon-height
    • [variable] md-tab-icon-padding-bottom

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-tabs

    See

    • [mixin] react-md-tabs

    react-md-tabs-indicator

    @mixin react-md-tabs-indicator($secondary-color: $md-secondary-color) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for the tab indicator only. This should probably not be used since it is included in the react-md-tabs mixin.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $secondary-color

    The app's secondary color to theme with.

    		Color$md-secondary-color

    Requires

    • [variable] md-tab-indicator-height

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-tabs

    See

    • [mixin] react-md-tabs

    react-md-tabbed-toolbars

    @mixin react-md-tabbed-toolbars() { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for toolbars that have tabs as well.

    Parameters

    None.

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-tabs

    react-md-tabs-overflow

    @mixin react-md-tabs-overflow($include-pagination-overflow: $md-tab-include-pagination-overflow, $include-menu-overflow: $md-tab-include-menu-overflow) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for desktop tab overflow.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $include-pagination-overflow

    Boolean if the styles for desktop pagination overflow should be included.

    		Boolean$md-tab-include-pagination-overflow
    $include-menu-overflow

    Boolean if the styles for a drop down menu tab overflow on desktop screens should be included.

    		Boolean$md-tab-include-menu-overflow

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-tabs

    react-md-tabs-swipeable

    @mixin react-md-tabs-swipeable() { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for the swipeable views as well as some offset classes for positioning the tabs content.

    Parameters

    None.

    Requires

    • [variable] md-toolbar-z-index
    • [variable] md-tab-height
    • [variable] md-tab-icon-height

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-tabs

    react-md-tabs-icon

    @mixin react-md-tabs-icon() { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for an icon in the tabs.

    Parameters

    None.

    Requires

    • [variable] md-tab-icon-margin-bottom

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-tabs

    react-md-tabs-content

    @mixin react-md-tabs-content($toolbar-height, $prominent-toolbar-height, $include-icons: $md-tab-include-icons, $include-toolbars: $md-tab-include-toolbars, $include-swipeable: $md-tab-include-swipeable) { ... }

    Description

    This is mostly an interal mixin for tabs. It will create the tabs content offset class names related to the current parameters.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $toolbar-height

    The current toolbar height.

    		Number— none
    $prominent-toolbar-height

    The current prominent toolbar height.

    		Number— none
    $include-icons

    Boolean if the icon styles for tabs should also be included.

    		Boolean$md-tab-include-icons
    $include-toolbars

    Boolean if the toolbar styles should be included.

    		Boolean$md-tab-include-toolbars
    $include-swipeable

    Boolean if the swipeable styles should be included.

    		Boolean$md-tab-include-swipeable

    Requires

    • [variable] md-tab-height
    • [variable] md-tab-icon-height
    • [variable] md-tab-height
    • [variable] md-tab-icon-height

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-tabs
    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-mobile-portrait
    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-mobile-landscape
    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-tablet
    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-desktop

    tabs, media-queries

    mixins

    react-md-tabs-mobile

    @mixin react-md-tabs-mobile() { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for tabs on mobile devices.

    Parameters

    None.

    Requires

    • [mixin] md-ios-scroll-momentum
    • [variable] md-tab-mobile-min-width
    • [variable] md-tab-mobile-font-size
    • [variable] md-font-medium
    • [variable] md-tab-mobile-font-size

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-media

    react-md-tabs-mobile-portrait

    @mixin react-md-tabs-mobile-portrait($include-icons: $md-tab-include-icons, $include-toolbars: $md-tab-include-toolbars, $include-prominent-toolbars: $md-tabinclude-prominent-toolbars, $include-swipeable: $md-tab-include-swipeable) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for tabs on mobile devices that are portrait. This really only adds styles for offsetting the tabs content when there is a toolbar. No styles will be included if the $include-toolbars or $include-swipeable params are false.

    This mixin will define some offset class names to position the tabs content.

    • .md-tabs-content--offset-toolbar
    • .md-tabs-content--offset-toolbar-icon
    • .md-tabs-content--offset-toolbar-prominent

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $include-icons

    Boolean if the styles for offsetting the tabs content when there is a tab with both a label and an icon.

    		Boolean$md-tab-include-icons
    $include-toolbars

    Boolean if the styles for offsetting the tabs content when there is a .md-tabs-container containing both a toolbar and tabs.

    		Boolean$md-tab-include-toolbars
    $include-prominent-toolbars

    Boolean if the styles for offsetting the tabs content when there is a .md-tabs-container containing both a prominent toolbar and tabs.

    		Boolean$md-tabinclude-prominent-toolbars
    $include-swipeable

    Boolean if the tab's content is swipeable.

    		Boolean$md-tab-include-swipeable

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-content
    • [variable] md-toolbar-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-mobile-portrait-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-prominent-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-mobile-prominent-height

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-media

    react-md-tabs-mobile-landscape

    @mixin react-md-tabs-mobile-landscape($include-icons: $md-tab-include-icons, $include-toolbars: $md-tab-include-toolbars, $include-swipeable: $md-tab-include-swipeable) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for tabs on mobile devices that are landscape. This really only adds styles for offsetting the tabs content when there is a toolbar. No styles will be included if the $include-toolbars or $include-swipeable params are false.

    This mixin will define some offset class names to position the tabs content.

    • .md-tabs-content--offset-toolbar
    • .md-tabs-content--offset-toolbar-icon

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $include-icons

    Boolean if the styles for offsetting the tabs content when there is a tab with both a label and an icon.

    		Boolean$md-tab-include-icons
    $include-toolbars

    Boolean if the styles for offsetting the tabs content when there is a .md-tabs-container containing both a toolbar and tabs.

    		Boolean$md-tab-include-toolbars
    $include-swipeable

    Boolean if the tab's content is swipeable.

    		Boolean$md-tab-include-swipeable

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-content
    • [variable] md-toolbar-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-mobile-landscape-height

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-media

    react-md-tabs-tablet

    @mixin react-md-tabs-tablet($include-icons: $md-tab-include-icons, $include-toolbars: $md-tab-include-toolbars, $include-prominent-toolbars: $md-tabinclude-prominent-toolbars, $include-swipeable: $md-tab-include-swipeable) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for tabs on tablet devices. This really only adds styles for offsetting the tabs content when there is a toolbar. No styles will be included if the $include-toolbars or $include-swipeable params are false.

    This mixin will define some offset class names to position the tabs content.

    • .md-tabs-content--offset-toolbar
    • .md-tabs-content--offset-toolbar-icon

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $include-icons

    Boolean if the styles for offsetting the tabs content when there is a tab with both a label and an icon.

    		Boolean$md-tab-include-icons
    $include-toolbars

    Boolean if the styles for offsetting the tabs content when there is a .md-tabs-container containing both a toolbar and tabs.

    		Boolean$md-tab-include-toolbars
    $include-prominent-toolbars

    Boolean if the styles for offsetting the tabs content when there is a .md-tabs-container containing both a prominent toolbar and tabs.

    		Boolean$md-tabinclude-prominent-toolbars
    $include-swipeable

    Boolean if the tab's content is swipeable.

    		Boolean$md-tab-include-swipeable

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-content
    • [variable] md-toolbar-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-tablet-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-prominent-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-tablet-prominent-height

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-media

    react-md-tabs-desktop

    @mixin react-md-tabs-desktop($include-icons: $md-tab-include-icons, $include-toolbars: $md-tab-include-toolbars, $include-prominent-toolbars: $md-tab-include-prominent-toolbars, $include-swipeable: $md-tab-include-swipeable, $include-dense-icons: $md-font-icon-include-dense) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for tabs on desktop screens.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $include-icons

    Boolean if the styles for a tab with a label and an icon should be included.

    		Boolean$md-tab-include-icons
    $include-toolbars

    Boolean if the styles for a simple container holding a toolbar and tabs should be included.

    		Boolean$md-tab-include-toolbars
    $include-prominent-toolbars

    Boolean if the styles for the simple container holding a toolbar and tabs should include the prominent toolbar styles.

    		Boolean$md-tab-include-prominent-toolbars
    $include-swipeable

    Boolean if the styles for swiping the tab content on mobile devices should be included.

    		Boolean$md-tab-include-swipeable
    $include-dense-icons

    Boolean if the dense spec for icons should be used for the tabs.

    		Boolean$md-font-icon-include-dense

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-content
    • [variable] md-tab-max-width
    • [variable] md-tab-desktop-min-width
    • [variable] md-tab-desktop-padding
    • [variable] md-tab-desktop-padding
    • [variable] md-tab-desktop-font-size
    • [variable] md-tab-desktop-font-size
    • [variable] md-font-icon-size
    • [variable] md-font-icon-dense-size
    • [variable] md-tab-icon-margin-bottom
    • [variable] md-toolbar-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-desktop-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-prominent-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-desktop-prominent-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-desktop-prominent-height

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-media

    react-md-tabs-media

    @mixin react-md-tabs-media($include-icons: $md-tab-include-icons, $include-toolbars: $md-tab-include-toolbars, $include-prominent-toolbars: $md-tab-include-prominent-toolbars, $include-swipeable: $md-tab-include-swipeable, $include-dense-icons: $md-font-icon-include-dense) { ... }

    Description

    Creates all the styles for tabs at different media sizes.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $include-icons

    Boolean if the styles for a tab with a label and an icon should be included.

    		Boolean$md-tab-include-icons
    $include-toolbars

    Boolean if the styles for a simple container holding a toolbar and tabs should be included.

    		Boolean$md-tab-include-toolbars
    $include-prominent-toolbars

    Boolean if the styles for the simple container holding a toolbar and tabs should include the prominent toolbar styles.

    		Boolean$md-tab-include-prominent-toolbars
    $include-swipeable

    Boolean if the styles for swiping the tab content on mobile devices should be included.

    		Boolean$md-tab-include-swipeable
    $include-dense-icons

    Boolean if the dense spec for icons should be used for the tabs.

    		Boolean$md-font-icon-include-dense

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-mobile
    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-mobile-portrait
    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-mobile-landscape
    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-tablet
    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-desktop
    • [variable] md-mobile-media
    • [variable] md-toolbar-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-prominent-height
    • [variable] md-mobile-portrait-media
    • [variable] md-mobile-landscape-media
    • [variable] md-tablet-media
    • [variable] md-desktop-media

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-tabs

    tabs, themes

    mixins

    react-md-theme-tabs

    @mixin react-md-theme-tabs($secondary-color: $md-secondary-color) { ... }

    Description

    Updates the theme for tabs only if the $secondary-color does not equal the $md-secondary-color. This really changes the color of the tab indicator.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $secondary-color

    The secondary app color to theme with.

    		Color$md-secondary-color

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    .theme-a-red {
  @include react-md-theme-tabs($md-red-a-200);
}

    Requires

    • [variable] md-secondary-color

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-everything
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-everything

    text-fields

    variables

    md-text-field-error-color

    $md-text-field-error-color: $md-red-500 !default;

    Description

    The error color to use on text fields. This will be applied to the any icons, text field error message, floating label, and the text field divider when there is an error.

    Type

    Color

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-text-field-floating-label
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-text-field-divider
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-text-field-message
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-text-field-icon

    md-text-field-divider-active-height

    $md-text-field-divider-active-height: 2px !default;

    Description

    The text field divider's active height. This is the bar that gets colored with the primary color or the error color.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-divider

    md-text-field-custom-sizes

    $md-text-field-custom-sizes: (
  title: ($md-display-1-font-size, .25s, 42px, 36px),
) !default;

    Description

    A Map of custom sizes for text fields. Set this to null if you do not want any custom sizes by default. This is a key value pair of String and List. The key will be used to generate a --suffix class name to apply to floating labels and text fields. The list must have a length of 4 where it is the:

    • custom font size
    • the transition duration modifier
    • the y position of the label when inactive on mobile devices
    • the y position of the label when inactive on desktop screens

    Type

    Map

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-text-fields

    md-text-field-include-multiline

    $md-text-field-include-multiline: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the multiline styling should be included by default.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-text-field-include-floating-label

    $md-text-field-include-floating-label: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the floating label styling should be included by default.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-text-field-include-block

    $md-text-field-include-block: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the block styling should be included by default.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-text-field-include-icon

    $md-text-field-include-icon: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the icon styling for text fields should be included by default.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-text-field-include-message

    $md-text-field-include-message: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the message styling for text fields should be included by default.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-text-field-include-password

    $md-text-field-include-password: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the password text field styling should be included by default.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-text-field-include-inline-indicator

    $md-text-field-include-inline-indicator: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the minimal styling for inline indicators for text fields should be included by default.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-text-field-message-font-size

    $md-text-field-message-font-size: 12px !default;

    Description

    The font size for the text field messages.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-message

    md-text-field-active-font-size

    $md-text-field-active-font-size: 12px !default;

    Description

    The font size for the floating label when it is floating above the text field.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    Description

    Type

    Description

    Type

    Type

    md-text-field-line-height

    $md-text-field-line-height: 1.15 !default;

    Description

    The line-height to use for the text field's input. This will not be applied to multiline text fields. This value should be more than 1 to support firefox clipping letters.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-container

    mixins

    react-md-text-fields

    @mixin react-md-text-fields($primary-color: $md-primary-color, $light-theme: $md-light-theme, $error-color: $md-red-500, $include-media: $md-media-included, $include-multiline: $md-text-field-include-multiline, $include-floating-label: $md-text-field-include-floating-label, $include-block: $md-text-field-include-block, $include-icon: $md-text-field-include-icon, $include-message: $md-text-field-include-message, $include-password: $md-text-field-include-password, $include-inline-indicator: $md-text-field-include-inline-indicator, $include-dense-icons: $md-font-icon-include-dense, $custom-sizes: $md-text-field-custom-sizes) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the css for text fields. The floating label, block styling, icon, password, and messages are all optional. These sections can be enabled or disabled by modifying the params on this mixin or modifying the default values. If the $include-media param is true, the mobile and desktop media queries will be included for all included parts of the text fields.

    Also if the $md-text-field-custom-sizes map is defined, each custom size will be created.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $primary-color

    The primary color to theme text fields with.

    		Color$md-primary-color
    $light-theme

    Boolean if the text fields should be styled for the light or dark theme.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme
    $error-color

    The error color to use with text fields.

    		Color$md-red-500
    $include-media

    Boolean if the media queries should be included.

    		Boolean$md-media-included
    $include-multiline

    Boolean if the multiline styling of text fields should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-multiline
    $include-floating-label

    Boolean if the floating label styles should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-floating-label
    $include-block

    Boolean if the block styling should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-block
    $include-icon

    Boolean if the minimal styling for using icons should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-icon
    $include-message

    Boolean if the text field message styling should be included. This is the css for the counter and/or help/error text.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-message
    $include-password

    Boolean if the styling for password text fields should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-password
    $include-inline-indicator

    Bolean if the styling for inline indicators should be included. If the $include-password param is true, this will automatically be included as well.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-inline-indicator
    $include-dense-icons

    Boolean if the dense font icon styles should be included for text fields.

    		Boolean$md-font-icon-include-dense
    $custom-sizes

    This is a map of size names and font sizes to apply as custom sizes for the text field.

    		Map$md-text-field-custom-sizes

    Example

    Basic Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-text-fields;

// or
$md-primary-color: $md-light-blue-500;
@include react-md-text-fields;

// or
@include react-md-text-fields($md-light-theme, $md-light-blue-500);

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-text-fields-media
    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-container
    • [mixin] react-md-text-field
    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-divider
    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-floating-label
    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-message
    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-icon
    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-inline-indicator
    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-password
    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-custom-sizes
    • [variable] md-text-field-custom-sizes

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-everything

    See

    • [mixin] react-md-text-fields-media

    react-md-text-field-container

    @mixin react-md-text-field-container($light-theme: $md-light-theme, $include-multiline: $md-text-field-include-multiline, $include-block: $md-text-field-include-block, $include-message: $md-text-field-include-message) { ... }

    Description

    Includes only the md-text-field-container css. This should normally be used from the react-md-text-fields mixin. The placeholders will also be styled accordingly.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $light-theme

    Boolean if currently using the light theme.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme
    $include-multiline

    Boolean if the multiline text field css should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-multiline
    $include-block

    Boolean if the block styling for text fields should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-block
    $include-message

    Boolean if the styles for the inline messages or counter should be included. This will only every create styles if the include-block param is true as well.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-message

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-text-field-container;

// or
$md-primary-color: $md-orange-500;
@include react-md-text-field-container;

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-placeholders
    • [function] get-color
    • [variable] md-text-field-line-height
    • [variable] md-transition-time

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-text-fields

    react-md-text-field

    @mixin react-md-text-field($light-theme: $md-light-theme, $include-multiline: $md-text-field-include-multiline, $include-floating-label: $md-text-field-include-floating-label) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the css for the input / textarea tags for text fields. This is normally used only within the react-md-text-fields mixin.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $light-theme

    Boolean if the text field should be styled for the light-theme.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme
    $include-multiline

    Boolean if the multiline styling of text fields should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-multiline
    $include-floating-label

    Boolean if the floating label styles should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-floating-label

    Example

    Basic Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-text-field;

    Requires

    • [variable] md-white-base

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-text-fields

    react-md-text-field-floating-label

    @mixin react-md-text-field-floating-label($primary-color: $md-primary-color, $light-theme: $md-light-theme, $error-color: $md-red-500) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for the text field's floating label.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $primary-color

    The primary color to theme text fields with.

    		Color$md-primary-color
    $light-theme

    Boolean if the text fields should be styled for the light or dark theme.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme
    $error-color

    The error color to use with text fields.

    		Color$md-red-500

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-text-field-floating-label;

    Requires

    • [function] get-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [variable] md-transition-time
    • [variable] md-text-field-active-font-size

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-text-fields

    react-md-text-field-divider

    @mixin react-md-text-field-divider($primary-color: $md-primary-color, $light-theme: $md-light-theme, $error-color: $md-red-500) { ... }

    Description

    Includes only css for the text field dividers. This is really used if you do not use the react-md-text-fields mixin.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $primary-color

    The primary color to theme text fields with.

    		Color$md-primary-color
    $light-theme

    Boolean if the text fields should be styled for the light or dark theme.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme
    $error-color

    The error color to use with text fields.

    		Color$md-red-500

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-text-field-divider;

    Requires

    • [placeholder] md-cell--right
    • [variable] md-text-field-divider-top-padding
    • [variable] md-text-field-divider-active-height
    • [variable] md-transition-time

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-text-fields

    react-md-text-field-message

    @mixin react-md-text-field-message($light-theme: $md-light-theme, $error-color: $md-red-500, $include-icon: $md-text-field-include-icon) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for the text field message / counter component.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $light-theme

    Boolean if the text fields should be styled for the light or dark theme.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme
    $error-color

    The error color to use with text fields.

    		Color$md-red-500
    $include-icon

    Boolean if the styles for text fields with icons and messages shuld be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-icon

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-text-field-message;

    Requires

    • [function] get-color
    • [variable] md-text-field-message-font-size
    • [variable] md-transition-time
    • [variable] md-default-padding

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-text-fields

    react-md-text-field-icon

    @mixin react-md-text-field-icon($primary-color: $md-primary-color, $light-theme: $md-light-theme, $error-color: $md-red-500) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for using icons with text fields. This is really only useful if you did not use the react-md-text-fields mixin.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $primary-color

    The primary color to theme text fields with.

    		Color$md-primary-color
    $light-theme

    Boolean if the text fields should be styled for the light or dark theme.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme
    $error-color

    The error color to use with text fields.

    		Color$md-red-500

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-text-field-icon;

    Requires

    • [function] get-color

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-text-fields

    react-md-text-field-password

    @mixin react-md-text-field-password($light-theme: $md-light-theme) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for having a password text field.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $light-theme

    Boolean if the text fields should be styled for the light or dark theme.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-text-field-password;

    Requires

    • [function] get-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [variable] md-font-icon-size
    • [variable] md-font-icon-size

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-text-fields

    react-md-text-field-inline-indicator

    @mixin react-md-text-field-inline-indicator() { ... }

    Description

    Creates teh styles for the text field's inline indicator. This is is for showing a password button or some other icon within the text field.

    Parameters

    None.

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-text-field-inline-indicator;

    Requires

    • [variable] md-font-icon-size

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-text-fields

    react-md-text-field-custom-sizes

    @mixin react-md-text-field-custom-sizes($font-sizes: $md-text-field-custom-sizes, $include-floating-label: $md-text-field-include-floating-label) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the css for custom sizes for text fields. This will create some class names with the components they modify and a --#{$name} suffix.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $font-sizes

    A map of size names with font sizes.

    		Map$md-text-field-custom-sizes
    $include-floating-label

    Boolean if the custom text field size should include the styles for floating labels.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-floating-label

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-text-field-custom-sizes;

    Example Usage CSS Output

    .md-text-field--title {
  font-size: 34px;
}

.md-floating-label--title {
  font-size: 34px;
}

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-text-fields

    text-fields, media-queries

    mixins

    react-md-text-fields-mobile

    @mixin react-md-text-fields-mobile($include-multiline: $md-text-field-include-multiline, $include-floating-label: $md-text-field-include-floating-label, $include-block: $md-text-field-include-block, $include-icon: $md-text-field-include-icon, $include-password: $md-text-field-include-password, $include-inline-indicator: $md-text-field-include-inline-indicator, $custom-sizes: $md-text-field-custom-sizes) { ... }

    Description

    Creates the styles for text fields on mobile devices. The floating labels, blocks, icons, or password styles can be ommitted by disabling the defaults or passing false here. This should normally be used within a media query for mobile devices.

    Note: If the password is included, icons will automatically be included since they share styles.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $include-multiline

    Boolean if the multiline styling of text fields should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-multiline
    $include-floating-label

    Boolean if the floating label styles should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-floating-label
    $include-block

    Boolean if the block styling should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-block
    $include-icon

    Boolean if the minimal styling for using icons should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-icon
    $include-password

    Boolean if the styling for password text fields should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-password
    $include-inline-indicator

    Bolean if the styling for inline indicators should be included. If the $include-password param is true, this will automatically be included as well.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-inline-indicator
    $custom-sizes

    A map of custom sizes to apply. If you do not want any custom sizes, set the global or this param to null.

    		Map$md-text-field-custom-sizes

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @media #{$md-mobile-media} {
  @include react-md-text-fields-mobile;
}

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-container-mobile
    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-mobile
    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-divider-mobile
    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-floating-label-mobile
    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-icon-mobile
    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-inline-indicator-mobile
    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-custom-sizes-mobile

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-text-fields-media

    react-md-text-fields-desktop

    @mixin react-md-text-fields-desktop($include-multiline: $md-text-field-include-multiline, $include-floating-label: $md-text-field-include-floating-label, $include-block: $md-text-field-include-block, $include-icon: $md-text-field-include-icon, $include-message: $md-text-field-include-message, $include-password: $md-text-field-include-password, $include-inline-indicator: $md-text-field-include-inline-indicator, $include-dense-icons: $md-font-icon-include-dense, $custom-sizes: $md-text-field-custom-sizes) { ... }

    Description

    Creates the styles for text fields on desktop screens. The floating labels, blocks, icons, or password styles can be ommitted by disabling the defaults or passing false here. This should normally be used within a media query for desktop screens.

    Note: If the password is included, icons will automatically be included since they share styles.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $include-multiline

    Boolean if the multiline styling of text fields should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-multiline
    $include-floating-label

    Boolean if the floating label styles should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-floating-label
    $include-block

    Boolean if the block styling should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-block
    $include-icon

    Boolean if the minimal styling for using icons should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-icon
    $include-message

    Boolean if the text field message styling should be included. This is the css for the counter and/or help/error text.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-message
    $include-password

    Boolean if the styling for password text fields should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-password
    $include-inline-indicator

    Bolean if the styling for inline indicators should be included. If the $include-password param is true, this will automatically be included as well.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-inline-indicator
    $include-dense-icons

    Boolean if the dense font icon styles should be included for text fields.

    		Boolean$md-font-icon-include-dense
    $custom-sizes

    A map of custom sizes to apply. If you do not want any custom sizes, set the global or this param to null.

    		Map$md-text-field-custom-sizes

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @media #{$md-desktop-media} {
  @include react-md-text-fields-desktop;
}

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-container-desktop
    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-desktop
    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-divider-desktop
    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-floating-label-desktop
    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-icon-desktop
    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-inline-indicator-desktop
    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-custom-sizes-desktop

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-text-fields-media

    react-md-text-fields-media

    @mixin react-md-text-fields-media($include-multiline: $md-text-field-include-multiline, $include-floating-label: $md-text-field-include-floating-label, $include-block: $md-text-field-include-block, $include-icon: $md-text-field-include-icon, $include-message: $md-text-field-include-message, $include-password: $md-text-field-include-password, $include-inline-indicator: $md-text-field-include-inline-indicator, $include-dense-icons: $md-font-icon-include-dense, $custom-sizes: $md-text-field-custom-sizes) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the media queries for text fields on mobile devices and desktop screens. The floating labels, blocks, icons, or password styles can be ommitted by disabling the defaults or passing false here. This should normally be used within a media query for mobile devices.

    Note: If the password is included, icons will automatically be included since they share styles.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $include-multiline

    Boolean if the multiline styling of text fields should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-multiline
    $include-floating-label

    Boolean if the floating label styles should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-floating-label
    $include-block

    Boolean if the block styling should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-block
    $include-icon

    Boolean if the minimal styling for using icons should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-icon
    $include-message

    Boolean if the text field message styling should be included. This is the css for the counter and/or help/error text.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-message
    $include-password

    Boolean if the styling for password text fields should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-password
    $include-inline-indicator

    Bolean if the styling for inline indicators should be included. If the $include-password param is true, this will automatically be included as well.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-inline-indicator
    $include-dense-icons

    Boolean if the dense font icon styles should be included for text fields.

    		Boolean$md-font-icon-include-dense
    $custom-sizes

    A map of custom sizes to apply. If you do not want any custom sizes, set the global or this param to null.

    		Map$md-text-field-custom-sizes

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-text-fields-media;

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-text-fields-mobile
    • [mixin] react-md-text-fields-desktop
    • [variable] md-mobile-media
    • [variable] md-desktop-media

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-text-fields
