    react-md-text-field-custom-size-mobile

    @mixin react-md-text-field-custom-size-mobile($name, $list, $include-floating-label: $md-text-field-include-floating-label) { ... }

    Description

    Creates the styles for a custom sized text field for mobile devices. This should normally be used within the react-md-text-field-custom-sizes-mobile mixin.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $name

    The custom size name.

    		String— none
    $list

    A list containing the font size, the transition-time, the mobile y position and the desktop y position.

    		List— none
    $include-floating-label

    Boolean if floating label styles should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-floating-label

    Example

    Example usage SCSS

    @media #{$md-mobile-media} {
  @include react-md-text-field-custom-size-mobile('title', (34px, .25s, 46px, 34px));

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-custom-sizes-mobile

    See

    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-custom-sizes-mobile

    react-md-text-field-custom-size-desktop

    @mixin react-md-text-field-custom-size-desktop($name, $list, $include-floating-label: $md-text-field-include-floating-label) { ... }

    Description

    Creates the styles for a custom sized text field for desktop screens. This should normally be used within the react-md-text-field-custom-sizes-desktop mixin.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $name

    The custom size name.

    		String— none
    $list

    A list containing the font size, the transition-time, the mobile y position and the desktop y position.

    		List— none
    $include-floating-label

    Boolean if floating label styles should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-floating-label

    Example

    Example usage SCSS

    @media #{$md-desktop-media} {
  @include react-md-text-field-custom-size-desktop('title', (34px, .25s, 46px, 34px));

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-custom-sizes-desktop

    See

    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-custom-sizes-desktop

    react-md-text-field-custom-sizes-mobile

    @mixin react-md-text-field-custom-sizes-mobile($custom-sizes: $md-text-field-custom-sizes, $include-floating-label: $md-text-field-include-floating-label) { ... }

    Description

    Creates all the styles for all the custom sizes for text fields for mobile devices. This should normally be used in a media query or the react-md-text-fields mixin.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $custom-sizes

    A map of custom sizes to use

    		Map$md-text-field-custom-sizes
    $include-floating-label

    Boolean if floating label styles should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-floating-label

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @media #{$md-mobile-media} {
  @include react-md-text-field-custom-sizes-mobile($md-text-field-custom-sizes);
}

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-custom-size-mobile

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-text-fields-mobile

    See

    • [mixin] react-md-text-fields
    • [variable] md-text-field-custom-sizes

    react-md-text-field-custom-sizes-desktop

    @mixin react-md-text-field-custom-sizes-desktop($custom-sizes: $md-text-field-custom-sizes, $include-floating-label: $md-text-field-include-floating-label) { ... }

    Description

    Creates all the styles for all the custom sizes for text fields for desktop screens. This should normally be used in a media query or the react-md-text-fields mixin.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $custom-sizes

    A map of custom sizes to use

    		Map$md-text-field-custom-sizes
    $include-floating-label

    Boolean if floating label styles should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-floating-label

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @media #{$md-desktop-media} {
  @include react-md-text-field-custom-sizes-desktop($md-text-field-custom-sizes);
}

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-custom-size-desktop

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-text-fields-desktop

    See

    • [mixin] react-md-text-fields
    • [variable] md-text-field-custom-sizes

    text-fields, themes

    mixins

    react-md-theme-text-fields

    @mixin react-md-theme-text-fields($primary-color, $light-theme: $md-light-theme, $error-color: $md-red-500, $include-multiline: $md-text-field-include-multiline, $include-floating-label: $md-text-field-include-floating-label, $include-block: $md-text-field-include-block, $include-icon: $md-text-field-include-icon, $include-message: $md-text-field-include-message, $include-password: $md-text-field-include-password) { ... }

    Description

    Themes all parts of the text fields if they are included.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $primary-color

    The primary color to theme text fields with.

    		Color— none
    $light-theme

    Boolean if the text fields should be styled for the light or dark theme.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme
    $error-color

    The error color to use with text fields.

    		Color$md-red-500
    $include-multiline

    Boolean if the multiline styling of text fields should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-multiline
    $include-floating-label

    Boolean if the floating label styles should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-floating-label
    $include-block

    Boolean if the block styling should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-block
    $include-icon

    Boolean if the minimal styling for using icons should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-icon
    $include-message

    Boolean if the text field message styling should be included. This is the css for the counter and/or help/error text.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-message
    $include-password

    Boolean if the styling for password text fields should be included.

    		Boolean$md-text-field-include-password

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    .my-subtheme {
  @include react-md-theme-text-fields($md-blue-500);
}

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-placeholders
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-text-field-divider
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-text-field-floating-label
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-text-field-icon
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-text-field-message
    • [function] get-color
    • [variable] md-light-theme

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-everything
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-everything

    See

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-text-field-icon
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-text-field-divider
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-text-field-message
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-text-field-floating-label

    react-md-theme-text-field-floating-label

    @mixin react-md-theme-text-field-floating-label($primary-color: $md-primary-color, $light-theme: $md-light-theme, $error-color: $md-text-field-error-color) { ... }

    Description

    Modifies the styles of the text-field-floating-label ONLY if:

    • the $primary-color is different than $md-primary-color
    • the $light-theme is different than $md-light-theme
    • the $error-color is different than $md-error-color.

    In most cases, you should use the react-md-theme-text-fields mixin instead.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $primary-color

    The primary color to use.

    		Color$md-primary-color
    $light-theme

    Boolean if using the light theme.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme
    $error-color

    The error color to use.

    		Color$md-text-field-error-color

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    .my-subsection-styling {
  @include react-md-theme-text-field-floating-label($md-light-blue-400, true, $md-orange-500);
}

    Requires

    • [function] get-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [variable] md-primary-color
    • [variable] md-light-theme
    • [variable] md-text-field-error-color

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-text-fields

    See

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-text-fields

    react-md-theme-text-field-divider

    @mixin react-md-theme-text-field-divider($primary-color: $md-primary-color, $error-color: $md-text-field-error-color) { ... }

    Description

    Modifies the styles of the text-field-divider ONLY if:

    • the $primary-color is different than $md-primary-color
    • the $error-color is different than $md-error-color.

    In most cases, you should use the react-md-theme-text-fields mixin instead.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $primary-color

    The primary color to use.

    		Color$md-primary-color
    $error-color

    The error color to use.

    		Color$md-text-field-error-color

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    .my-subsection-styling {
  @include react-md-theme-text-field-divider($md-light-blue-400, true, $md-orange-500);
}

    Requires

    • [variable] md-primary-color
    • [variable] md-text-field-error-color

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-text-fields

    See

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-text-fields

    react-md-theme-text-field-message

    @mixin react-md-theme-text-field-message($light-theme: $md-light-theme, $error-color: $md-text-field-error-color) { ... }

    Description

    Modifies the styles of the text-field-message ONLY if:

    • the $light-theme is different than $md-light-theme
    • the $error-color is different than $md-text-field-error-color

    In most cases, you should use the react-md-theme-text-fields mixin instead.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $light-theme

    Boolean if using the light theme.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme
    $error-color

    The error color to use.

    		Color$md-text-field-error-color

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    .my-subsection-styling {
  @include react-md-theme-text-field-message(true);
}

    Requires

    • [function] get-color
    • [variable] md-light-theme
    • [variable] md-text-field-error-color

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-text-fields

    See

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-text-fields

    react-md-theme-text-field-icon

    @mixin react-md-theme-text-field-icon($primary-color: $md-primary-color, $light-theme: $md-light-theme, $error-color: $md-text-field-error-color) { ... }

    Description

    Modifies the styles of the text-field-icon ONLY if:

    • the $primary-color is different than $md-primary-color
    • the $light-theme is different than $md-light-theme
    • the $error-color is different than $md-error-color.

    In most cases, you should use the react-md-theme-text-fields mixin instead.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $primary-color

    The primary color to use.

    		Color$md-primary-color
    $light-theme

    Boolean if using the light theme.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme
    $error-color

    The error color to use.

    		Color$md-text-field-error-color

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    .my-subsection-styling {
  @include react-md-theme-text-field-icon($md-light-blue-400, true, $md-orange-500);
}

    Requires

    • [function] get-color
    • [variable] md-primary-color
    • [variable] md-light-theme
    • [variable] md-text-field-error-color

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-text-fields

    See

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-text-fields

    react-md-theme-text-field-password

    @mixin react-md-theme-text-field-password($light-theme: $md-light-theme) { ... }

    Description

    Modifies the styles of the text-field-password ONLY if the value of $light-theme is different than the $md-light-theme. This is only useful if you have a part of your app that is dark-theme while another section is not. In most cases, you should use the react-md-theme-text-fields mixin instead.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $light-theme

    Boolean if using the light theme.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    .my-subsection-styling {
  @include react-md-theme-text-field-password(true);
}

    Requires

    • [function] get-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [variable] md-light-theme

    See

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-text-fields

    react-md-theme-placeholders

    @mixin react-md-theme-placeholders($color) { ... }

    Description

    Applies a color to all the browser placeholder psuedo elements.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $color

    The placeholder color to use

    		Color— none

    Example

    Basic Usage SCSS

    .md-primary.md-toolbar {
  @include md-theme-placeholders($md-dark-theme-help-text-color);
}

    Basic Usage CSS Output

    .md-primary.md-toolbar {
  :-moz-placeholder {
    color: $color;
  }

  ::-moz-placeholder {
    color: $color;
  }

  :-ms-input-placeholder {
    color: $color;
  }

  ::-webkit-input-placeholder {
    color: $color;
  }
}

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-text-field-container
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-text-fields
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars

    themes

    variables

    md-primary-color

    $md-primary-color: $md-indigo-500 !default;

    Description

    The primary color to use throughout the app. This should be a color with a -500 suffix.

    Type

    Color

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-buttons
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-colors
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-colors
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-pickers
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-sliders
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-discrete-slider
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-text-field-floating-label
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-text-field-divider
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-text-field-icon

    md-primary-hover-opacity

    $md-primary-hover-opacity: .9 !default;

    Description

    The opacity to apply to the primary color with the md-background--primary class name.

    Type

    Number

    md-primary-background-text-color

    $md-primary-background-text-color: $md-white-base !default;

    Description

    The text color to use for any text that inside the .md-background--primary class name. This should ideally pass the color contrast test when.

    Type

    Color

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-colors
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-colors

    md-secondary-color

    $md-secondary-color: $md-pink-a-200 !default;

    Description

    The secondary color to use throughout the app. This should be a color with a -a-{NUMBER} suffix.

    Type

    Color

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-buttons
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-colors
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-colors
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-data-tables
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-data-tables

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-progress-linear
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-progress-linear
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-selection-controls-switch
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-tabs

    md-secondary-hover-opacity

    $md-secondary-hover-opacity: .9 !default;

    Description

    The opacity to apply to the secondary color with the md-background--secondary class name.

    Type

    Number

    md-secondary-background-text-color

    $md-secondary-background-text-color: $md-white-base !default;

    Description

    The text color to use for any text that inside the .md-background--secondary class name. This should ideally pass the color contrast test when.

    Type

    Color

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-colors
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-colors

    md-light-theme

    $md-light-theme: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the application is to be themed with the light theme.

    Type

    Boolean

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-autocompletes

    toolbars

    variables

    md-toolbar-include-themed

    $md-toolbar-include-themed: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the themed toolbars should be included. A themed toolbar just has a different background color based on the $md-light-theme.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-toolbar-include-prominent

    $md-toolbar-include-prominent: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the prominent styles should be included for toolbars. This really just makes a toolbar with a bigger height.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-toolbar-include-btn-text

    $md-toolbar-include-btn-text: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the very small styles for flat or raised buttons in toolbars should be included.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-toolbar-include-text-fields

    $md-toolbar-include-text-fields: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the styling for text fields in toolbars should be included.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-toolbar-include-autocompletes

    $md-toolbar-include-autocompletes: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the styles for autocompletes in toolbars should be included. This really just updates the autocomplete's menu to span the entire viewport on mobile devices.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-toolbar-include-select-fields

    $md-toolbar-include-select-fields: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the select field styling in toolbars should be included.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-toolbar-include-relative-padding-class-names

    $md-toolbar-include-relative-padding-class-names: false !default;

    Description

    Boolean if two additional class names should be included for positioning toolbar relatives with padding instead of margin. Creates .md-toolbar-relative--padded and md-toolbar-relative--prominent-padded

    NOTE: If $md-toolbar-relative-padding is true, these classes will still not be created. In addition, if $md-toolbar-include-prominent is false, the prominent class name will not be created.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-toolbar-relative-padding

    $md-toolbar-relative-padding: false !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the .md-toolbar-relative and .md-toolbar-relative--prominent should use padding instead of margin for positioning.

    Type

    Boolean

    See

    • [variable] md-toolbar-include-relative-padding-class-names

    md-toolbar-inset-margin

    $md-toolbar-inset-margin: 8px !default;

    Description

    The amount of margin for an inset toolbar.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars

    md-toolbar-prominent-title-font-size

    $md-toolbar-prominent-title-font-size: $md-title-font-size !default;

    Description

    The toolbar's prominent title font size. This will only be included if it does not equal the $md-title-font-size variable.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars

    md-toolbar-mobile-portrait-height

    $md-toolbar-mobile-portrait-height: 56px !default;

    Description

    The height of a toolbar on mobile portrait devices.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-drawers-mobile
    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers-mobile
    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-mobile-portrait
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-mobile

    md-toolbar-mobile-landscape-height

    $md-toolbar-mobile-landscape-height: 48px !default;

    Description

    The height of a toolbar on moble landscape devices.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-drawers-mobile-landscape
    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers-mobile-landscape
    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-mobile-landscape
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-mobile-landscape

    md-toolbar-mobile-prominent-height

    $md-toolbar-mobile-prominent-height: null !default;

    Description

    The height of a prominent toolbar on mobile devices and any media above.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers-mobile-landscape
    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers-mobile-landscape
    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-mobile-portrait
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-mobile

    md-toolbar-mobile-btn-keyline

    $md-toolbar-mobile-btn-keyline: 16px !default;

    Description

    The keyline to use for the main nav button in the toolbar for mobile devices.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-mobile
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-mobile-landscape

    md-toolbar-mobile-title-keyline

    $md-toolbar-mobile-title-keyline: 72px !default;

    Description

    The keyline to use for the main title in the toolbar for mobile devices.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-mobile
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-mobile-landscape

    md-toolbar-mobile-select-field-margin

    $md-toolbar-mobile-select-field-margin: 6px !default;

    Description

    The top and bottom padding to apply to select fields that appear in toolbars.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-mobile
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-mobile

    See

    • [variable] md-toolbar-select-field-margin

    $md-toolbar-tablet-height: 64px !default;

    Type

    Number

    Description

    The prominent height for a toolbar on tablet displays.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers-tablet
    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers-tablet
    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-tablet
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-tablet

    See

    • [variable] md-toolbar-prominent-height

    md-toolbar-tablet-btn-keyline

    $md-toolbar-tablet-btn-keyline: 24px !default;

    Description

    The keyline to use for the main nav button in toolbars on tablets and desktop displays.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-tablet
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-desktop
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-desktop

    md-toolbar-tablet-title-keyline

    $md-toolbar-tablet-title-keyline: 80px !default;

    Description

    The keyline to use for the main title in a toolbar for tablets and desktop displays.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-tablet
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-desktop

    md-toolbar-tablet-select-field-margin

    $md-toolbar-tablet-select-field-margin: 10px !default;

    Description

    The top and bottom padding to apply to select fields that appear in toolbars.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-tablet
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-tablet

    See

    • [variable] md-toolbar-select-field-margin

    md-toolbar-tablet-landscape-select-field-margin

    $md-toolbar-tablet-landscape-select-field-margin: 12px !default;

    Description

    The top and bottom padding to apply to select fields that appear in landscape toolbars.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-tablet-landscape
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-tablet-landscape

    • [variable] md-toolbar-select-field-margin

    md-toolbar-desktop-height

    $md-toolbar-desktop-height: null !default;

    Description

    An optional height to apply to toolbars only on desktop displays.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers-desktop
    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers-desktop
    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-desktop
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-desktop

    See

    • [variable] md-toolbar-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-tablet-height

    md-toolbar-desktop-prominent-height

    $md-toolbar-desktop-prominent-height: null !default;

    Description

    An optional height to apply to prominent toolbars on desktop displays.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers-desktop
    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers-desktop
    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-desktop
    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-desktop
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-desktop

    See

    • [variable] md-toolbar-prominent-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-tablet-prominent-height

    md-toolbar-desktop-btn-keyline

    $md-toolbar-desktop-btn-keyline: null !default;

    Description

    An optional keyline to apply to the action buttons and main navigation in toolbars on desktop displays. If this is null, it will inherit the keyline from tablets.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-desktop
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-desktop

    See

    • [variable] md-toolbar-btn-keyline
    • [variable] md-toolbar-tablet-btn-keyline

    md-toolbar-desktop-title-keyline

    $md-toolbar-desktop-title-keyline: null !default;

    Description

    An optional keyline to apply to the toolbar's title on desktop displays. If this is null, it will inherit the keyline from tablets.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-desktop
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-desktop

    See

    • [variable] md-toolbar-title-keyline
    • [variable] md-toolbar-tablet-title-keyline

    md-toolbar-desktop-select-field-margin

    $md-toolbar-desktop-select-field-margin: null !default;

    Description

    An optional margin to apply to select fields that appear in toolbars on desktop displays. If this is null, it will inherit the margins from tablets.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-desktop
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-desktop
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-desktop

    See

    • [variable] md-toolbar-select-field-margin
    • [variable] md-toolbar-tablet-select-field-margin

    md-toolbar-height

    $md-toolbar-height: null !default;

    Description

    A height to use for the toolbar on all screen sizes. This value will have precidence over the mobile/tablet/desktop variables.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers
    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers
    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers-mobile-landscape
    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers-tablet

    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-mobile-landscape
    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-tablet

    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars

    md-toolbar-prominent-height

    $md-toolbar-prominent-height: if($md-toolbar-height != null, $md-toolbar-height * 2, 128px) !default;

    Description

    A height to use for prominent toolbars on all screen sizes. This value will have precidence over the mobile/tablet/desktop variables.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers
    • [mixin] react-md-navigation-drawers

    $md-toolbar-btn-keyline: null !default;

    mixins

    react-md-toolbars

    @mixin react-md-toolbars($light-theme: $md-light-theme, $include-media: $md-media-included, $include-themed: $md-toolbar-include-themed, $include-prominent: $md-toolbar-include-prominent, $include-btn-text: $md-toolbar-include-btn-text, $include-text-fields: $md-toolbar-include-text-fields, $include-autocompletes: $md-toolbar-include-autocompletes, $include-select-fields: $md-toolbar-include-select-fields, $include-dense-icons: $md-font-icon-include-dense, $include-relative-padding-class-names: $md-toolbar-include-relative-padding-class-names, $relative-padding: $md-toolbar-relative-padding) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for toolbars.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $light-theme

    Boolean if the toolbars should be themed for the light theme.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme
    $include-media

    Boolena if the toolbar media queries should be included.

    		Boolean$md-media-included
    $include-themed

    Boolean if the themed toolbars should be included.

    		Boolean$md-toolbar-include-themed
    $include-prominent

    Boolean if the prominent toolbar styles shoudl be included.

    		Boolean$md-toolbar-include-prominent
    $include-btn-text

    Boolean if the flat or raised button styles in toolbars should be included.

    		Boolean$md-toolbar-include-btn-text
    $include-text-fields

    Boolean if the styles for text fields in toolbars should be included. If the params include-autocomplete or include-select-fields are true, this will always be included.

    		Boolean$md-toolbar-include-text-fields
    $include-autocompletes

    Boolean if the styles for autocompletes in toolbars should be included.

    		Boolean$md-toolbar-include-autocompletes
    $include-select-fields

    Boolean if the styles for select fields in toolbars should be included.

    		Boolean$md-toolbar-include-select-fields
    $include-dense-icons

    Boolean if the dense spec for icons/buttons should be included.

    		Boolean$md-font-icon-include-dense
    $include-relative-padding-class-names

    Boolean if the relative padding class names should be included.

    		Boolean$md-toolbar-include-relative-padding-class-names
    $relative-padding

    Boolean if the .md-toolbar-relative class names should use padding instead of margin.

    		Boolean$md-toolbar-relative-padding

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-toolbars;

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-media
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-placeholders
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbar-relative
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbar-buttons
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbar-actions
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbar-titles
    • [function] get-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [variable] md-toolbar-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-z-index
    • [variable] md-toolbar-inset-margin
    • [variable] md-toolbar-inset-margin
    • [variable] md-white-base
    • [variable] md-white-base
    • [variable] md-toolbar-prominent-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-prominent-height
    • [variable] md-white-base
    • [variable] md-toolbar-height
    • [variable] md-transition-time
    • [variable] md-toolbar-prominent-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-mobile-portrait-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-prominent-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-prominent-title-font-size
    • [variable] md-title-font-size
    • [variable] md-toolbar-prominent-title-font-size
    • [variable] md-toolbar-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-prominent-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-height
    • [variable] md-btn-icon-size
    • [variable] md-btn-mobile-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-btn-keyline
    • [variable] md-toolbar-btn-keyline
    • [variable] md-btn-icon-padding
    • [variable] md-toolbar-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-title-keyline
    • [variable] md-btn-icon-size
    • [variable] md-toolbar-select-field-margin
    • [variable] md-toolbar-select-field-margin
    • [variable] md-toolbar-select-field-margin
    • [variable] md-title-font-size

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-everything

    [private] margin-or-padding

    @mixin margin-or-padding() { ... }

    Description

    A simple mixin that will either create padding-top or margin-top for the given value depending on if $padded is true.

    Parameters

    None.

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-toolbar-relative
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbar-relative

    react-md-toolbar-relative

    @mixin react-md-toolbar-relative($toolbar-height, $prominent-toolbar-height, $include-prominent, $include-relative-padding-class-names, $relative-padding) { ... }

    Description

    This is a utility mixin for creating the relative class names for toolbars. This should normally just be used within the react-md-toolbars mixin. It will optionally create the following class names:

    • md-toolbar-relative
    • md-toolbar-relative--padding
    • md-toolbar-relative--prominent
    • md-toolbar-relative--prominent-padding

    The class names will only be created if the related height is not null.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $toolbar-height

    The current height of the toolbar. This is used to create the offset.

    		Number— none
    $prominent-toolbar-height

    The current height of a prominent toolbar.

    		Number— none
    $include-prominent

    Boolean if the prominent styles for toolbars should be created.

    		Boolean— none
    $include-relative-padding-class-names

    Boolean if the padding suffix class names should also be created.

    		Boolean— none
    $relative-padding

    Boolean if the class names use padding by default instead of margin.

    		Boolean— none

    Requires

    • [mixin] margin-or-padding
    • [mixin] margin-or-padding

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-mobile
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-mobile-landscape
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-tablet
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-desktop

    react-md-toolbar-actions

    @mixin react-md-toolbar-actions($margin) { ... }

    Description

    A mixin that is mostly for internal use. It will create the toolbar action left/right styles

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $margin

    the current margin for the actions.

    		Number— none

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-mobile
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-mobile-landscape
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-tablet
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-desktop

    react-md-toolbar-buttons

    @mixin react-md-toolbar-buttons($toolbar-height, $icon-btn-size, $text-btn-size, $include-btn-text) { ... }

    Description

    A mixin that is mostly for internal use. It will apply additional margins to buttons that appear in toolbars based on the given parameters.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $toolbar-height

    The current toolbar height.

    		Number— none
    $icon-btn-size

    The current icon button size.

    		Number— none
    $text-btn-size

    The current text button size.

    		Number— none
    $include-btn-text

    Boolean if text buttons should be included.

    		Boolean— none

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-mobile
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-mobile-landscape
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-tablet
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-desktop

    react-md-toolbar-titles

    @mixin react-md-toolbar-titles($toolbar-height, $title-keyline, $btn-size, $btn-margin) { ... }

    Description

    A mixin that is mostly for internal use. It will apply additional styles for titles that appear in toolbars based on the given parameters.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $toolbar-height

    The current toolbar height

    		Number— none
    $title-keyline

    The current title's keyline to use.

    		Number— none
    $btn-size

    The current icon button's size.

    		Number— none
    $btn-margin

    The current margin for the icon button.

    		Number— none

    Requires

    • [variable] md-toolbar-height

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-mobile
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-mobile-landscape
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-tablet
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-desktop

    toolbars, media-queries

    mixins

    react-md-toolbars-mobile

    @mixin react-md-toolbars-mobile($include-prominent: $md-toolbar-include-prominent, $include-btn-text: $md-toolbar-include-btn-text, $include-select-fields: $md-toolbar-include-select-fields, $include-relative-padding-class-names: $md-toolbar-include-relative-padding-class-names, $relative-padding: $md-toolbar-relative-padding) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for toolbars on mobile devices. This should normally be used in a media query.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $include-prominent

    Boolean if the prominent toolbar styles should be included.

    		Boolean$md-toolbar-include-prominent
    $include-btn-text

    Boolean if the flat or raised button styles in toolbars should be included.

    		Boolean$md-toolbar-include-btn-text
    $include-select-fields

    Boolean if the styles for select fields in toolbars should be included.

    		Boolean$md-toolbar-include-select-fields
    $include-relative-padding-class-names

    Boolean if the relative padding class names should be included.

    		Boolean$md-toolbar-include-relative-padding-class-names
    $relative-padding

    Boolean if the .md-toolbar-relative class names should use padding instead of margin.

    		Boolean$md-toolbar-relative-padding

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @media #{$md-mobile-media} {
   @include react-md-toolbars-mobile;
}

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-toolbar-relative
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbar-buttons
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbar-actions
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbar-titles

    • [variable] md-toolbar-mobile-portrait-height

    • [variable] md-toolbar-mobile-prominent-height

    • [variable] md-btn-mobile-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-btn-keyline
    • [variable] md-toolbar-mobile-btn-keyline

    $include-btn-text

    		Boolean$md-toolbar-include-btn-text
    $include-select-fields

    		Boolean$md-toolbar-include-select-fields
    $include-relative-padding-class-names

    		Boolean$md-toolbar-include-relative-padding-class-names
    $relative-padding

    		Boolean$md-toolbar-relative-padding

    react-md-toolbars-tablet-landscape

    @mixin react-md-toolbars-tablet-landscape($include-select-fields: $md-toolbar-include-select-fields) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for toolbars for a landscape tablet. This should be used within a media query. This will really only generate styles if the include-text-fields param is true.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $include-select-fields

    Boolean if the styles for select fields in toolbars should be included.

    		Boolean$md-toolbar-include-select-fields

    Example

    @media #{$md-tablet-landscape-media} {
  @include react-md-toolbars-tablet-landscape;

    react-md-toolbars-desktop

    @mixin react-md-toolbars-desktop($include-prominent: $md-toolbar-include-prominent, $include-btn-text: $md-toolbar-include-btn-text, $include-select-fields: $md-toolbar-include-select-fields, $include-relative-padding-class-names: $md-toolbar-include-relative-padding-class-names, $relative-padding: $md-toolbar-relative-padding, $include-dense-icons: $md-font-icon-include-dense) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the styles for toolbars for a desktop display. This should be used within a media query. This will really only generate styles if the include-text-fields param is true.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $include-prominent

    Boolean if the prominent toolbar styles shoudl be included.

    		Boolean$md-toolbar-include-prominent
    $include-btn-text

    Boolean if the flat or raised button styles in toolbars should be included.

    		Boolean$md-toolbar-include-btn-text
    $include-select-fields

    Boolean if the styles for select fields in toolbars should be included.

    		Boolean$md-toolbar-include-select-fields
    $include-relative-padding-class-names

    Boolean if the relative padding class names should be included.

    		Boolean$md-toolbar-include-relative-padding-class-names
    $relative-padding

    Boolean if the .md-toolbar-relative class names should use padding instead of margin.

    		Boolean$md-toolbar-relative-padding
    $include-dense-icons

    Boolean if the dense spec for icons/buttons should be included.

    		Boolean$md-font-icon-include-dense

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @media #{$md-tablet-desktop} {
  @include react-md-toolbars-desktop;
}

    • [variable] md-toolbar-desktop-title-keyline
    • [variable] md-toolbar-btn-keyline
    • [variable] md-toolbar-btn-keyline
    • [variable] md-toolbar-btn-keyline
    • [variable] md-toolbar-tablet-btn-keyline
    • [variable] md-toolbar-tablet-height
    • [variable] md-btn-desktop-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-desktop-select-field-margin
    • [variable] md-toolbar-desktop-select-field-margin
    • [variable] md-toolbar-desktop-select-field-margin

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-media

    react-md-toolbars-media

    @mixin react-md-toolbars-media($include-prominent: $md-toolbar-include-prominent, $include-btn-text: $md-toolbar-include-btn-text, $include-select-fields: $md-toolbar-include-select-fields, $include-dense-icons: $md-font-icon-include-dense, $include-relative-padding-class-names: $md-toolbar-include-relative-padding-class-names, $relative-padding: $md-toolbar-relative-padding) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the media queries for toolbars.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $include-prominent

    Boolean if the prominent toolbar styles shoudl be included.

    		Boolean$md-toolbar-include-prominent
    $include-btn-text

    Boolean if the flat or raised button styles in toolbars should be included.

    		Boolean$md-toolbar-include-btn-text
    $include-select-fields

    Boolean if the styles for select fields in toolbars should be included.

    		Boolean$md-toolbar-include-select-fields
    $include-dense-icons

    Boolean if the dense spec for icons/buttons should be included.

    		Boolean$md-font-icon-include-dense
    $include-relative-padding-class-names

    Boolean if the relative padding class names should be included.

    		Boolean$md-toolbar-include-relative-padding-class-names
    $relative-padding

    Boolean if the .md-toolbar-relative class names should use padding instead of margin.

    		Boolean$md-toolbar-relative-padding

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-toolbars-media;

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-mobile
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-mobile-landscape
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-tablet
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-tablet-landscape
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars-desktop
    • [variable] md-toolbar-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-prominent-height
    • [variable] md-toolbar-title-keyline
    • [variable] md-toolbar-btn-keyline
    • [variable] md-mobile-media
    • [variable] md-mobile-landscape-media
    • [variable] md-tablet-media
    • [variable] md-tablet-landscape-media
    • [variable] md-desktop-media

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars

    toolbars, themes

    mixins

    react-md-theme-toolbars

    @mixin react-md-theme-toolbars($light-theme: $md-light-theme, $include-themed: $md-toolbar-include-themed) { ... }

    Description

    Updates the toolbar's themed color ONLY if the $light-theme does not equal the $md-light-theme and the $include-themed param is true.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $light-theme

    Boolean if the toolbars should be themed for the light theme.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme
    $include-themed

    Boolean if the themed toolbars should be included.

    		Boolean$md-toolbar-include-themed

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-theme-toolbars(false);

    Requires

    • [function] get-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [variable] md-light-theme
    • [variable] md-white-base

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-everything
    • [mixin] react-md-theme-everything

    toolbars, z-indexes

    $md-toolbar-z-index: 15 !default;

    Description

    The z-index for a fixed toolbar.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-swipeable
    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars

    See

    • [variable] md-btn-fixed-z-index

    • [variable] md-snackbar-z-index

    tooltips

    variables

    Type

    $md-tooltip-desktop-top-margin: 14px !default;

    mixins

    react-md-tooltips

    @mixin react-md-tooltips($media-included: $md-media-included) { ... }

    Description

    Creates the styles for tooltips.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $media-included

    Boolean if the media queries should be included.

    		Boolean$md-media-included

    Example

    Requires

    • [variable] md-transition-acceleration

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-everything

    tooltips, media-queries

    mixins

    react-md-tooltips-mobile

    @mixin react-md-tooltips-mobile() { ... }

    Description

    Creates the styles for tooltips on mobile devices. This should normally be used in a media query.

    Parameters

    None.

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @media #{$md-mobile-media} {
  @include react-md-tooltips-mobile;
}

    Requires

    • [variable] md-tooltip-mobile-font-size
    • [variable] md-tooltip-mobile-tile-height
    • [variable] md-tooltip-mobile-lr-padding
    • [variable] md-tooltip-mobile-lr-padding
    • [variable] md-tooltip-mobile-top-margin
    • [variable] md-tooltip-mobile-top-margin
    • [variable] md-tooltip-mobile-top-margin
    • [variable] md-tooltip-mobile-top-margin

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-tooltips-media

    react-md-tooltips-desktop

    @mixin react-md-tooltips-desktop() { ... }

    Description

    Creates the styles for tooltips on desktop screens. This should normally be used in a media query.

    Parameters

    None.

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @media #{$md-desktop-media} {
  @include react-md-tooltips-desktop;
}

    Requires

    • [variable] md-tooltip-desktop-font-size
    • [variable] md-tooltip-desktop-tile-height
    • [variable] md-tooltip-desktop-lr-padding
    • [variable] md-tooltip-desktop-lr-padding
    • [variable] md-tooltip-desktop-top-margin
    • [variable] md-tooltip-desktop-top-margin
    • [variable] md-tooltip-desktop-top-margin
    • [variable] md-tooltip-desktop-top-margin

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-tooltips-media

    react-md-tooltips-media

    @mixin react-md-tooltips-media() { ... }

    Description

    Includes the media queries for tooltips on mobile devices and desktop screens.

    Parameters

    None.

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-tooltips-media;

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-tooltips-mobile
    • [mixin] react-md-tooltips-desktop
    • [variable] md-mobile-media
    • [variable] md-desktop-media

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-tooltips

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-toolbars
    • [mixin] react-md-tooltips

    md-transition-sharp

    $md-transition-sharp: cubix-bezier(.4, 0, .6, 1) !default;

    Description

    The transition function for objects that may return to the screen at any time.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [placeholder] md-transition--sharp

    Links

    • https://material.google.com/motion/duration-easing.html#duration-easing-common-durations

    md-transition-standard

    $md-transition-standard: cubic-bezier(.4, 0, .2, 1) !default;

    Description

    The transition function for growing and shrinking material, among other property changes. This is the most common and applied to every element by default.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-inks
    • [mixin] react-md-progress-linear
    • [placeholder] md-transition--standard
    • [mixin] react-md-typography

    Links

    • https://material.google.com/motion/duration-easing.html#duration-easing-common-durations

    md-transition-acceleration

    $md-transition-acceleration: cubic-bezier(.4, 0, 1, 1) !default;

    Description

    The transition function for objects that enter the screen at full velocity from off-screen and slowly decelerate to a resting point.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-inks
    • [mixin] react-md-layovers
    • [mixin] react-md-progress-linear
    • [mixin] react-md-snackbars
    • [mixin] react-md-tooltips
    • [placeholder] md-transition--acceleration

    Links

    • https://material.google.com/motion/duration-easing.html#duration-easing-common-durations

    md-transition-deceleration

    $md-transition-deceleration: cubic-bezier(0, 0, .2, 1) !default;

    Description

    The transition function for objects that leave the screen at full velocity.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-inks
    • [mixin] react-md-layovers
    • [mixin] react-md-snackbars
    • [mixin] react-md-tooltips
    • [placeholder] md-transition--decceleration

    Links

    • https://material.google.com/motion/duration-easing.html#duration-easing-common-durations

    placeholders

    md-transition--sharp

    %md-transition--sharp { ... }

    Description

    A placeholder for getting the sharp transition. The transition function for objects that may return to the screen at any time.

    Requires

    • [variable] md-transition-sharp

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-transitions

    Links

    • https://material.google.com/motion/duration-easing.html#duration-easing-common-durations

    md-transition--standard

    %md-transition--standard { ... }

    Description

    A placeholder for getting the standard (and default) transitin. The transition function for growing and shrinking material, among other property changes.

    Requires

    • [variable] md-transition-standard

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-transitions

    Links

    • https://material.google.com/motion/duration-easing.html#duration-easing-common-durations

    md-transition--acceleration

    %md-transition--acceleration { ... }

    Description

    A placeholder for getting the acceleration transition. The transition function for objects that enter the screen at full velocity from off-screen and slowly decelerate to a resting point.

    Requires

    • [variable] md-transition-acceleration

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-data-table-card-headers
    • [mixin] react-md-transitions

    Links

    • https://material.google.com/motion/duration-easing.html#duration-easing-common-durations

    md-transition--decceleration

    %md-transition--decceleration { ... }

    Description

    A placeolder for getting the decceleration transition. The transition function for objects that leave the screen at full velocity.

    Requires

    • [variable] md-transition-deceleration

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-data-table-card-headers
    • [mixin] react-md-transitions

    Links

    • https://material.google.com/motion/duration-easing.html#duration-easing-common-durations

    mixins

    react-md-transitions

    @mixin react-md-transitions() { ... }

    Description

    Includes some class names for adding the different transitions for material design.

    Parameters

    None.

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-transitions;

    ClassNames Created

    - `md-transition--acceleration`
- `md-transition--decceleration`
- `md-transition--sharp`
- `md-transition--standard`

    Requires

    • [placeholder] md-transition--sharp
    • [placeholder] md-transition--standard
    • [placeholder] md-transition--acceleration
    • [placeholder] md-transition--decceleration

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-everything

    Links

    • https://material.google.com/motion/duration-easing.html#duration-easing-common-durations

    typography

    variables

    md-typography-extended

    $md-typography-extended: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the typography should extend the base html tags as well.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-typography-include-text-container

    $md-typography-include-text-container: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if the text container class name should be created by default. This class name is really used to keep a max line-width for text.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-typography-include-utilities

    $md-typography-include-utilities: true !default;

    Description

    Boolean if common text positioning/transforms/styles class names should be included by default.

    Type

    Boolean

    md-font-name

    $md-font-name: Roboto !default;

    Description

    The font name to use throughout the application. It is recommended to use Roboto or Noto, but it can be whatever.

    Type

    String

    md-font-family

    $md-font-family: '#{$md-font-name}', sans-serif !default;

    Description

    The font family for the application. This only combines the $md-font-name with a fallback font of sans-serif.

    Type

    String

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-typography
    • [mixin] react-md-typography

    md-typography-max-line-length

    $md-typography-max-line-length: 640px !default;

    Description

    The max length a line of text can be.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-typography-text-container

    md-html-min-width

    $md-html-min-width: 100% !default;

    Description

    The min width to apply to the html tag. This is set mostly if you are using components that rely on hiding the main window's toolbar to prevent scrolling.

    Setting this value to null will not update the html with the min-width.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-typography

    md-font-light

    $md-font-light: 300 !default;

    Description

    The light text weight.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [placeholder] md-display-4
    • [placeholder] md-font-light
    • [function] get-font-suffix

    md-font-regular

    $md-font-regular: 400 !default;

    Description

    The regular text weight.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [placeholder] md-font-regular
    • [mixin] react-md-typography
    • [function] get-font-suffix

    md-font-medium

    $md-font-medium: 500 !default;

    Description

    The medium text weight.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-buttons
    • [mixin] react-md-data-table-column
    • [mixin] react-md-data-table-edit-dialogs
    • [mixin] react-md-data-table-card-headers
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-base
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-date
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-time
    • [mixin] react-md-subheaders
    • [mixin] react-md-tabs-mobile
    • [mixin] react-md-tooltips
    • [placeholder] md-font-medium
    • [function] get-font-suffix

    md-font-bold

    $md-font-bold: 700 !default;

    Description

    The bold text weight.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-date
    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-date
    • [placeholder] md-font-bold
    • [function] get-font-suffix

    [private] md-font-weights

    $md-font-weights: ($md-font-light $md-font-regular $md-font-medium $md-font-bold);

    Description

    A list of all the text weights. This is mainly used so you can loop over the weights and include locally hosted fonts.

    Type

    List

    md-display-4-font-size

    $md-display-4-font-size: 112px !default;

    Description

    The .md-display-4 font size.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-typography-desktop
    • [mixin] react-md-typography-desktop

    $md-subheading-2-line-height: 28px !default;

    Description

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [placeholder] md-subheading-2

    md-subheading-1-line-height

    $md-subheading-1-line-height: 24px !default;

    Description

    The .md-subheading-1 line height.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [placeholder] md-subheading-1

    [private] md-font-size-base

    $md-font-size-base: 14 !default;

    Description

    The base font size. This is really just the mobile font size without the px suffix.

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-pickers-time
    • [mixin] react-md-typography

    md-body-mobile-font-size

    $md-body-mobile-font-size: #{$md-font-size-base}px !default;

    Description

    The .md-body-1 and .md-body-2 font size for mobile devices.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-typography-mobile
    • [mixin] react-md-typography-mobile

    md-body-desktop-font-size

    $md-body-desktop-font-size: 13px !default;

    Description

    The .md-body-1 and .md-body-2 font size for desktop screens.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-typography-desktop
    • [mixin] react-md-typography-desktop

    md-body-2-line-height

    $md-body-2-line-height: 24px !default;

    Description

    The .md-body-2 fnt size.

    Type

    Number

    md-body-1-line-height

    $md-body-1-line-height: 20px !default;

    Description

    The .md-body-1 fnt size.

    Type

    Number

    md-caption-font-size

    $md-caption-font-size: 12px !default;

    Description

    The .md-caption font size.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [placeholder] md-caption

    md-line-height

    $md-line-height: 20 / $md-font-size-base !default;

    Description

    The line height to use on almost all elements.

    Type

    Number

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-cards-title

    • [placeholder] md-body-1
    • [placeholder] md-body-2
    • [mixin] react-md-typography

    mixins

    react-md-typography

    @mixin react-md-typography($light-theme: $md-light-theme, $include-media: $md-media-included, $extend-html-tags: $md-typography-extended, $include-text-container: $md-typography-include-text-container, $include-utilities: $md-typography-include-utilities) { ... }

    Description

    This includes the css for simple typography in react-md. It will update all items to use box-sizing: border-box, set the font family, set the line-height, text-rendering, and create the base class names for the typography. If the $extend-html-tags is true, the h1 - h6, p, and caption tags will be updated with the corresponding css class name.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $light-theme

    Boolean if the application is using the light theme.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme
    $include-media

    Boolean if the media queries should be included.

    		Boolean$md-media-included
    $extend-html-tags

    Boolean if the base html tags should be updated or not.

    		Boolean$md-typography-extended
    $include-text-container

    Boolean if the text container class name should be included.

    		Boolean$md-typography-include-text-container
    $include-utilities

    Boolean if the text helper class names should be included.

    		Boolean$md-typography-include-utilities

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-typography-media
    • [mixin] react-md-typography-utilities
    • [mixin] react-md-typography-text-container
    • [function] get-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [placeholder] md-display-1
    • [placeholder] md-headline
    • [placeholder] md-title
    • [placeholder] md-subheading-2
    • [placeholder] md-subheading-1
    • [placeholder] md-body-2
    • [placeholder] md-body-1
    • [placeholder] md-caption
    • [placeholder] md-display-1
    • [placeholder] md-display-2
    • [placeholder] md-display-3
    • [placeholder] md-display-4
    • [placeholder] md-headline
    • [placeholder] md-title
    • [placeholder] md-subheading-1
    • [placeholder] md-subheading-2
    • [placeholder] md-body-1
    • [placeholder] md-body-2
    • [placeholder] md-caption
    • [variable] md-transition-standard
    • [variable] md-light-theme-background-color
    • [variable] md-dark-theme-background-color
    • [variable] md-font-size-base
    • [variable] md-html-min-width
    • [variable] md-font-family
    • [variable] md-font-regular
    • [variable] md-line-height
    • [variable] md-font-family

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-everything

    react-md-typography-text-container

    @mixin react-md-typography-text-container() { ... }

    Description

    Creates a utility class name for containing long amounts of text. This is set up to center the text in the page and keep the line width to the $md-typography-max-line-length.

    Parameters

    None.

    Requires

    • [placeholder] md-block-centered
    • [variable] md-typography-max-line-length

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-typography

    react-md-typography-utilities

    @mixin react-md-typography-utilities() { ... }

    Description

    Creates utility class names for common text positioning and transforms.

    Parameters

    None.

    Requires

    • [placeholder] md-text-left
    • [placeholder] md-text-center
    • [placeholder] md-text-right
    • [placeholder] md-text-justify
    • [placeholder] md-text-capitalize
    • [placeholder] md-text-lowercalse
    • [placeholder] md-text-uppercase
    • [placeholder] md-text-nowrap
    • [placeholder] md-text-no-select
    • [placeholder] md-font-light
    • [placeholder] md-font-regular
    • [placeholder] md-font-medium
    • [placeholder] md-font-bold

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-typography

    host-google-font

    @mixin host-google-font($font-name: Roboto, $font-weight: 400, $fonts-url) { ... }

    Description

    Creates a font face for a locally hosted google font

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $font-name

    The font name to create a font face for

    		StringRoboto
    $font-weight

    The font weight of the google font

    		Number400
    $fonts-url

    The url to your fonts.

    		String— none

    Example

    Basic Usage Sass

    @include host-google-font(Roboto, 400);
@include host-google-font(Roboto, 500, my-special-fonts);

    Basic Usage CSS Output

    @font-face {
  font-family: 'Roboto';
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 400;
  src: local('Roboto'),
       local('Roboto-Regular'),
       url(/fonts/roboto/Roboto-Regular.ttf) format('truetype');
}

@font-face {
  font-family: 'Roboto';
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 500;
  src: local('Roboto'),
       local('Roboto-Medium'),
       url(my-sepcial-fonts/Roboto-Medium.ttf) format('truetype');
}

    Requires

    • [function] get-font-suffix — The function to convert a font weight to a font suffix.

    host-material-icons

    @mixin host-material-icons($font-url: '/fonts/material-icons') { ... }

    Description

    Hosts the material icon font library locally by declaring the font face and the .material-icons css class.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $font-url

    The path to the material icons fonts

    		String'/fonts/material-icons'

    Example

    Basic Usage Sass

    @include host-material-icons('/fonts/material-icons');

    Basic Usage CSS Output

     @font-face {
   font-family: 'Material Icons';
   font-style: normal;
   font-weight: 400;
   src: url(/fonts/material-icons/MaterialIcons-Regular.eot');
   src: local('Material Icons'),
        local('MaterialIcons-Regular'),
        url(/fonts/material-icons/MaterialIcons-Regular.woff2') format('woff2'),
        url(/fonts/material-icons/MaterialIcons-Regular.woff') format('woff'),
        url(/fonts/material-icons/MaterialIcons-Regular.ttf') format('truetype');
 }

 .material-icons {
   direction: ltr;
   display: inline-block;
   font-family: 'Material Icons';
   // Support for IE.
   font-feature-settings: 'liga';
   font-size: $md-font-icon-size;
   // Support for Firefox.
   -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
   // Support for all WebKit browsers.
   -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
   font-style: normal;
   font-weight: normal;
   height: 1em;
   letter-spacing: normal;
   line-height: 1;
   // Support for Safari and Chrome.
   text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;
   text-transform: none;
   white-space: nowrap;
   width: 1em;
   word-wrap: normal;
}

    Requires

    • [variable] md-font-icon-size

    functions

    get-font-suffix

    @function get-font-suffix($font-weight) { ... }

    Description

    Converts a font weight into the google font suffix.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $font-weight

    The font weight to convert

    		Number— none

    Returns

    String —

    the font suffix

    Requires

    • [variable] md-font-light
    • [variable] md-font-regular
    • [variable] md-font-medium
    • [variable] md-font-bold

    Used by

    • [mixin] host-google-font

    typography, media-queries

    mixins

    react-md-typography-mobile

    @mixin react-md-typography-mobile($extend-html-tags: $md-typography-extended) { ... }

    Description

    Creates the css for typography on mobile devices. If the $extend-html-tags param is true, the h6, h5, h4, and p tags will also be modified. This should most likely be used within a media query.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $extend-html-tags

    Boolean if the base html tags should be updated.

    		Boolean$md-typography-extended

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @media #{$md-mobile-media} {
  @include react-md-typography-mobile;
}

    Requires

    • [variable] md-subheading-mobile-font-size
    • [variable] md-body-mobile-font-size
    • [variable] md-subheading-mobile-font-size
    • [variable] md-body-mobile-font-size

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-typography-media

    react-md-typography-desktop

    @mixin react-md-typography-desktop($extend-html-tags: $md-typography-extended) { ... }

    Description

    Creates the css for typography on desktop screens. If the $extend-html-tags param is true, the h6, h5, h4, and p tags will also be modified. This should most likely be used within a media query.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $extend-html-tags

    Boolean if the base html tags should be updated.

    		Boolean$md-typography-extended

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @media #{$md-desktop-media} {
  @include react-md-typography-desktop;
}

    Requires

    • [variable] md-subheading-desktop-font-size
    • [variable] md-body-desktop-font-size
    • [variable] md-subheading-desktop-font-size
    • [variable] md-body-desktop-font-size

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-typography-media

    react-md-typography-media

    @mixin react-md-typography-media($extend-html-tags: $md-typography-extended) { ... }

    Description

    Includes the mobile and desktop media queries for typography. If the $extend-html-tags param is true, the h6, h5, h4, and p tags will also be modified.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $extend-html-tags

    Boolean if the base html tags should be updated.

    		Boolean$md-typography-extended

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-typography-media;

    Requires

    • [mixin] react-md-typography-mobile
    • [mixin] react-md-typography-desktop
    • [variable] md-mobile-media
    • [variable] md-desktop-media

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-typography

    typography, themes

    mixins

    react-md-theme-typography

    @mixin react-md-theme-typography($html-class-name, $light-theme: $md-light-theme, $extend-html-tags: $md-typography-extended) { ... }

    Description

    Updates the theme of the typography ONLY if the $light-theme does not equal $md-light-theme. You will need to apply this $html-class-name to the html tag to get the effects. This is because the base html tag had the background color set which everything inherits.

    Parameters

    parameter Nameparameter Descriptionparameter Typeparameter Default value
    $html-class-name

    The class name to use for the html tag.

    		String— none
    $light-theme

    Boolean if using the light theme.

    		Boolean$md-light-theme
    $extend-html-tags

    Boolean if the base html tags should be styled as well.

    		Boolean$md-typography-extended

    Example

    Example Usage SCSS

    @include react-md-theme-typography(dark-theme, false);

    Example Usage CSS Output

    .dark-theme {
  background: #303030;
}

.dark-theme .md-headline,
.dark-theme .md-title,
.dark-theme .md-subheading-2,
.dark-theme .md-subheading-1,
.dark-theme .md-body-2,
.dark-theme .md-body-1,
.dark-theme h4,
.dark-theme h3,
.dark-theme h2,
.dark-theme h1,
.dark-theme p {
  color: #fff;
}

.dark-theme .md-display-1,
.dark-theme .md-caption,
.dark-theme h1,
.dark-theme caption {
  color: rgba(#fff, .7);
}

    Requires

    • [function] get-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [function] get-color
    • [variable] md-light-theme

    Used by

    • [mixin] react-md-theme-everything
    SassDoc
